'wo'de'guo'shi'sheng'guo'huang'jin 我的果实胜过黄金
'wo'de'hao'chu'bu'zai'ni'yi'wai 我的好处不在你以外
'wo'de'hu'qiu'ru'le'ta'de'er'zhong 我的呼求入了他的耳中
'wo'de'hua'que'bu'neng'fei'qu 我的话却不能废去
'wo'de'hua'ye'chang'zai'ni'men'li'mian 我的话也常在你们里面
'wo'de'ji'hen'ye'yao'li'kai'ni 我的忌恨也要离开你
'wo'de'jia'ou'zai'nv'zi'zhong 我的佳偶在女子中
'wo'de'jian'zheng'hai'shi'zhen'de 我的见证还是真的
'wo'de'jiao'bu'ruo'pian'li'zheng'lu 我的脚步若偏离正路
'wo'de'jiao'ta'ding'le'ni'de'lu'jing 我的脚踏定了你的路径
'wo'de'jiao'xun'bu'shi'wo'zi'ji'de 我的教训不是我自己的
'wo'de'jiao'xun'yao'lin'li'ru'yu 我的教训要淋漓如雨
'wo'de'jiao'yin'ye'he'hua'gao'ju 我的角因耶和华高举
'wo'de'jiao'zhan'zai'ping'tan'di'fang 我的脚站在平坦地方
'wo'de'jiu'en'bi'bu'chi'yan 我的救恩必不迟延

'wo'de'jiu'en'zhi'dao'wan'dai 我的救恩直到万代
'wo'de'ju'suo'bi'zai'ta'men'zhong'jian 我的居所必在他们中间
'wo'de'kong'ju'bu'shi'yin'wei'hei'an 我的恐惧不是因为黑暗

'wo'de'li'liang'na'shi'ru'he 我的力量那时如何
'wo'de'li'qi'jiu'li'kai'wo 我的力气就离开我
'wo'de'lian'ai'da'da'fa'dong 我的怜爱大大发动
'wo'de'lian'yin'ku'qi'fa'zi 我的脸因哭泣发紫

'wo'de'liang'ren'bai'er'qie'hong 我的良人白而且红
'wo'de'liang'ren'hao'xiang'ling'yang 我的良人好象羚羊
'wo'de'liang'ren'que'yi'zhuan'shen'zou'le 我的良人却已转身走了

'wo'de'liang'shou'di'xia'mei'yao 我的两手滴下没药

'wo'de'ling'zai'wo'li'mian'fa'hun 我的灵在我里面发昏

'wo'de'min'yu'ni'de'min'yi'yang 我的民与你的民一样

'wo'de'ming'zheng'tian'shou'xie'du 我的名整天受亵渎
'wo'de'mu'ren'bu'xun'zhao'wo'de'yang 我的牧人不寻找我的羊
'wo'de'na'da'xiang'gao'fa'chu'xiang'wei 我的哪哒香膏发出香味
'wo'de'nian'ri'ru'ri'ying'pian'xie 我的年日如日影偏斜
'wo'de'nian'ri'ru'yan'yun'xiao'mie 我的年日如烟云消灭
'wo'de'nian'sui'wei'tan'xi'suo'kuang'fei 我的年岁为叹息所旷废

'wo'de'nu'qi'xiang'mu'ren'fa'zuo 我的怒气向牧人发作
'wo'de'nu'qi'yao'xiang'ta'fa'zuo 我的怒气要向他发作
'wo'de'pan'duan'ye'shi'zhen'de 我的判断也是真的
'wo'de'pi'fu'hei'er'tuo'luo 我的皮肤黑而脱落

'wo'de'pu'ren'mo'xi'si'le 我的仆人摩西死了
'wo'de'pu'ren'xing'shi'bi'you'zhi'hui 我的仆人行事必有智慧
'wo'de'pu'ren'yao'zai'na'li'ju'zhu 我的仆人要在那里居住
'wo'de'pu'ren'ye'bi'bang'zhu'ta'men 我的仆人也必帮助他们
'wo'de'pu'ren'yi'ban'zuo'gong 我的仆人一半做工
'wo'de'pu'ren'zai'na'kuai'tian'shou'ge 我的仆人在那块田收割
'wo'de'qi'dao'ye'shi'qing'jie 我的祈祷也是清洁
'wo'de'qi'zi'ye'nian'ji'lao'mai'le 我的妻子也年纪老迈了
'wo'de'qin'qi'yu'wo'duan'jue 我的亲戚与我断绝
'wo'de'qin'yin'bian'wei'bei'yin 我的琴音变为悲音
'wo'de'quan'yuan'dou'zai'ni'li'mian 我的泉源都在你里面
'wo'de'ren'ding'ji'ran'xi'shao 我的人丁既然稀少
'wo'de'ri'zi'bi'pao'xin'de'geng'kuai 我的日子比跑信的更快
'wo'de'ri'zi'bi'suo'geng'kuai 我的日子比梭更快
'wo'de'ri'zi'bu'shi'shen'shao'me 我的日子不是甚少么
'wo'de'ri'zi'guo'qu'ru'kuai'chuan 我的日子过去如快船
'wo'de'ri'zi'yi'jing'guo'le 我的日子已经过了
'wo'de'rong'yao'jing'guo'de'shi'hou 我的荣耀经过的时候

'wo'jiang'wo'de'hua'chuan'gei'ni 我将我的话传给你
'wo'jiang'wo'de'ping'an'ci'gei'ni'men 我将我的平安赐给你们
'wo'jiang'wo'ping'an'de'yue'ci'gei'ta 我将我平安的约赐给他
'wo'jiang'yi'qie'dou'geng'xin'le 我将一切都更新了
'wo'jiang'yue'gui'an'zhi'zai'qi'zhong 我将约柜安置在其中
'wo'jiang'zhe'hai'zi'gui'yu'ye'he'hua 我将这孩子归与耶和华
'wo'jiang'zhe'liang'yang'ci'gei'ta 我将这两样赐给他
'wo'jiang'zhe'meng'gao'su'le'shu'shi 我将这梦告诉了术士
'wo'jiang'zhe'nv'er'gei'da'wei 我将这女儿给大卫
'wo'jiang'zhe'shi'gao'su'ni'men 我将这事告诉你们
'wo'jiang'zhe'shi'yi'yi'bi'jiao 我将这事一一比较
'wo'jiang'zhe'xie'hua'xie'gei'ni'men 我将这些话写给你们
'wo'jiang'zhe'xie'shi'gao'su'ni'men 我将这些事告诉你们
'wo'jiang'zhe'yi'qie'shi'fang'zai'xin'shang 我将这一切事放在心上
'wo'jiang'zhen'li'gao'su'ni'men 我将真理告诉你们
'wo'jiang'zhen'qing'gao'su'ni'men 我将真情告诉你们
'wo'jiang'zhi'zhun'ta'men'yu'ni'tong'qu 我降旨准他们与你同去
'wo'jiao'zhui'sui'ta'de'bu'lv 我脚追随他的步履
'wo'jin'li'shi'xu'wu'xu'kong 我尽力是虚无虚空
'wo'jin'ri'bi'shi'ya'ha'de'jian'wo 我今日必使亚哈得见我
'wo'jin'ri'cheng'le'he'deng'ren 我今日成了何等人
'wo'jin'ri'fen'fu'ni'zhe'jian'shi 我今日吩咐你这件事
'wo'jin'ri'jiang'zhe'hua'gao'su'ni'men 我今日将这话告诉你们
'wo'jin'ri'jiu'bi'zhao'zhe'hua'er'xing 我今日就必照这话而行
'wo'jin'ri'lai'bu'shi'yao'gong'ji'ni 我今日来不是要攻击你
'wo'jin'ri'ming'ming'gao'su'ni'men 我今日明明告诉你们
'wo'jin'ri'sheng'ni'de'na'yi'wei 我今日生你的那一位
'wo'jin'ri'shi'ni'cheng'wei'jian'cheng 我今日使你成为坚城
'wo'jin'ri'suo'jing'jiao'ni'men'de 我今日所警教你们的
'wo'jin'ri'xiang'qi'wo'de'zui'lai 我今日想起我的罪来
'wo'jin'ri'yi'ci'te'bie'zhi'jiao'ni 我今日以此特别指教你
'wo'jin'ri'zai'ni'men'mian'qian'shou'shen 我今日在你们面前受审
'wo'jin'ri'zhong'kan'ni'de'xing'ming 我今日重看你的性命
'wo'jin'tian'suo'fen'fu'ni'de 我今天所吩咐你的
'wo'jing'guo'lan'duo'ren'de'tian'di 我经过懒惰人的田地
'wo'jing'huang'shen'zhi'bu'neng'kan 我惊惶甚至不能看
'wo'jing'ting'jian'ta'zhe'yang'de'shi'ne 我竟听见他这样的事呢
'wo'jiu'an'zhe'jia'zhi'gei'ni 我就按着价值给你
'wo'jiu'ba'na'ge'ye'gei'ni 我就把那个也给你
'wo'jiu'ba'ni'suo'qian'de'dou'mian'le 我就把你所欠的都免了
'wo'jiu'ba'ta'men'gan'chu'qu 我就把他们赶出去
'wo'jiu'ba'zhe'yi'qie'dou'ci'gei'ni 我就把这一切都赐给你
'wo'jiu'bi'jian'ding'ta'de'guo'wei 我就必坚定他的国位
'wo'jiu'bi'jian'gu'ni'de'guo'wei 我就必坚固你的国位
'wo'jiu'bi'shi'zhe'dian'ru'shi'luo 我就必使这殿如示罗
'wo'jiu'bi'yi'ye'he'hua'wei'wo'de 我就必以耶和华为我的
'wo'jiu'bu'duo'kai'ni'de'mian 我就不躲开你的面
'wo'jiu'bu'jia'hai'yu'ni'men 我就不加害与你们
'wo'jiu'bu'shi'ji'du'de'pu'ren'le 我就不是基督的仆人了
'wo'jiu'bu'yuan'yi'zhe'yang'xing 我就不愿意这样行
'wo'jiu'bu'zai'yu'ni'men'tong'zai'le 我就不再与你们同在了
'wo'jiu'bu'zhi'dao'gai'tiao'xuan'shen'me 我就不知道该挑选甚么
'wo'jiu'bu'zhi'he'wei'tan'xin 我就不知何为贪心
'wo'jiu'chai'qian'ren'qu'jian'ta 我就差遣人去见他
'wo'jiu'chang'yu'ni'men'tong'zai 我就常与你们同在
'wo'jiu'chi'ze'you'da'de'gui'zhou'shuo 我就斥责犹大的贵胄说
'wo'jiu'chu'dao'ni'suo'cang'de'tian'li 我就出到你所藏的田里
'wo'jiu'chu'diao'ya'bi'mi'le 我就除掉亚比米勒
'wo'jiu'fen'fu'ba'ta'liu'xia 我就吩咐把他留下
'wo'jiu'fen'fu'ren'jiang'men'guan'suo 我就吩咐人将门关锁
'wo'jiu'gei'ni'men'jiang'xia'shi'yu 我就给你们降下时雨
'wo'jiu'gei'ni'men'san'shi'jian'li'yi 我就给你们叁十件里衣
'wo'jiu'jiang'lie'guo'ci'ni'wei'ji'ye 我就将列国赐你为基业
'wo'jiu'jin'yi'wei'shi'li'zhe 我就近一位侍立者
'wo'jiu'jing'huang'fu'fu'zai'di 我就惊慌俯伏在地
'wo'jiu'jing'ju'you'men'er'zuo 我就惊惧忧闷而坐
'wo'jiu'jiu'zhe'ta'de'hu'zi 我就揪着它的胡子
'wo'jiu'ju'mu'xiang'bei'guan'kan 我就举目向北观看
'wo'jiu'kuai'lin'dao'ni'na'li 我就快临到你那里
'wo'jiu'lai'dao'ti'le'ya'bi 我就来到提勒亚毕
'wo'jiu'ling'ni'xia'dao'di'jun'na'li 我就领你下到敌军那里
'wo'jiu'liu'ta'zai'mi'li'dou 我就留他在米利都
'wo'jiu'mian'qiang'xian'shang'fan'ji 我就勉强献上燔祭
'wo'jiu'ming'ming'de'gao'su'ta'men'shuo 我就明明的告诉他们说
'wo'jiu'pai'shui'zhi'li'zhe'di 我就派谁治理这地
'wo'jiu'qing'yuan'jian'mo'bu'yan 我就情愿缄默不言
'wo'jiu'ru'jiang'si'de'ren'yi'yang 我就如将死的人一样
'wo'jiu'ruan'ruo'xiang'bie'ren'yi'yang 我就软弱象别人一样
'wo'jiu'shang'ni'shi'she'ke'le'yin'zi 我就赏你十舍客勒银子
'wo'jiu'she'xia'yi'ge'di'fang 我就设下一个地方
'wo'jiu'shi'bi'xu'he'ni'tong'si 我就是必须和你同死
'wo'jiu'shi'cong'shui'huai'de'yun 我就是从谁怀的孕
'wo'jiu'shi'gei'ta'ti'xie'ye'bu'pei 我就是给他提鞋也不配
'wo'jiu'shi'ni'men'de'an'xi 我就使你们得安息
'wo'jiu'shi'ni'men'suo'zhao'de'ren 我就是你们所找的人
'wo'jiu'shi'ni'suo'bi'po'de'ye'su 我就是你所逼迫的耶稣
'wo'jiu'shi'ta'men'chu'ai'ji'di 我就使他们出埃及地
'wo'jiu'shi'zhe'dian'man'le'rong'yao 我就使这殿满了荣耀
'wo'jiu'shi'zhou'zu'lin'dao'ni'men 我就使咒诅临到你们
'wo'jiu'si'xiang'ni'de'qi'shi 我就思想你的奇事
'wo'jiu'tan'ai'zhe'xie'wu'jian 我就贪爱这些物件
'wo'jiu'wei'ni'men'zen'yang'xing 我就为你们怎样行
'wo'jiu'xia'dao'yao'jiang'de'jia'li'qu 我就下到窑匠的家里去
'wo'jiu'xiang'chen'tu'he'lu'hui'yi'ban 我就象尘土和炉灰一般
'wo'jiu'xiang'ni'de'chou'di'zuo'chou'di 我就向你的仇敌作仇敌
'wo'jiu'xiang'qi'zhu'de'hua'shuo 我就想起主的话说
'wo'jiu'yan'lei'xia'liu'ru'he 我就眼泪下流如河
'wo'jiu'yan'mian'bu'gu'zhe'cheng 我就掩面不顾这城
'wo'jiu'yao'lu'guo'ni'men'na'li 我就要路过你们那里
'wo'jiu'yao'xing'shi'yu'ni'men'fan'dui 我就要行事与你们反对
'wo'jiu'ying'cheng'lv'fa'shi'shan'de 我就应承律法是善的
'wo'jiu'ying'yun'ni'suo'qiu'de 我就应允你所求的
'wo'jiu'yong'bi'mo'xie'zai'shu'shang 我就用笔墨写在书上
'wo'jiu'zai'nu'zhong'qi'shi'shuo 我就在怒中起誓说
'wo'jiu'zai'zhe'li'da'san'zuo'peng 我就在这里搭叁座棚
'wo'jiu'zao'yi'gao'su'ni'men'le 我就早已告诉你们了
'wo'jiu'zao'yi'tang'wo'an'shui 我就早已躺卧安睡
'wo'jiu'zhao'yang'an'wei'ni'men 我就照样安慰你们
'wo'jiu'zhao'zhe'suo'fen'fu'de'qu'xing 我就照着所吩咐的去行
'wo'jiu'zhao'zhe'ye'he'hua'de'hua 我就照着耶和华的话
'wo'jiu'zhi'dao'ta'men'shi'ji'lu'bo 我就知道他们是基路伯
'wo'jiu'zhi'shi'ni'suo'dang'hang'de'shi 我就指示你所当行的事
'wo'jiu'zhi'xi'xiang'ni'fa'de'fen'nu 我就止息向你发的忿怒
'wo'jiu'zhu'zai'ji'jing'zhi'zhong'le 我就住在寂静之中了
'wo'jiu'zou'dao'tian'shi'na'li 我就走到天使那里
'wo'jiu'zun'shou'ni'kou'zhong'de'fa'du 我就遵守你口中的法度
'wo'jiu'zuo'mei'you'lv'fa'de'ren 我就作没有律法的人
'wo'jiu'zuo'shen'me'yang'de'ren 我就作甚么样的人
'wo'ju'pa'de'shi'hou'yao'yi'kao'ni 我惧怕的时候要倚靠你
'wo'jue'bu'xiang'da'wei'shuo'huang 我决不向大卫说谎
'wo'kan'chu'ni'zheng'zai'ku'dan'zhi'zhong 我看出你正在苦胆之中
'wo'kan'de'shi'hou'bing'mei'you'ren 我看的时候并没有人
'wo'kan'jian'bian'jiang'ta'men'chu'diao 我看见便将他们除掉
'wo'kan'jian'di'dang'zhong'you'yi'ke'shu 我看见地当中有一棵树
'wo'kan'jian'jiu'liu'xin'si'xiang 我看见就留心思想
'wo'kan'jian'pang'fo'you'bo'li'hai 我看见彷佛有玻璃海
'wo'kan'jian'shou'de'qi'tou'zhong 我看见兽的七头中
'wo'kan'jian'ta'bei'dian'wu'le 我看见他被玷污了
'wo'kan'jian'ta'suo'xing'de'dao 我看见他所行的道
'wo'kan'jian'yi'fei'xing'de'shu'juan 我看见一飞行的书卷
'wo'kan'jian'yi'ge'shao'kai'de'guo 我看见一个烧开的锅
'wo'kan'jian'yi'gen'xing'shu'zhi 我看见一根杏树枝
'wo'kan'jian'yi'kuang'xia'tian'de'guo'zi 我看见一筐夏天的果子
'wo'kan'jian'zai'ji'tan'di'xia 我看见在祭坛底下
'wo'kan'jian'zhu'chang'zai'wo'yan'qian 我看见主常在我眼前
'wo'kan'jian'zhu'zhan'zai'ji'tan'pang'bian 我看见主站在祭坛旁边
'wo'kan'qian'tou'ren'de'pao'fa 我看前头人的跑法
'wo'kan'ta'que'bu'zai'xian'shi 我看他却不在现时
'wo'kan'wan'shi'jin'dou'you'xian 我看万事尽都有限
'wo'kan'zhe'jiu'ling'le'xun'hui 我看着就领了训诲
'wo'kan'zhong'ni'de'yi'qie'ming'ling 我看重你的一切命令
'wo'kan'zhong'ta'kou'zhong'de'yan'yu 我看重他口中的言语
'wo'kao'zhe'na'jia'gei'wo'li'liang'de 我靠着那加给我力量的
'wo'kao'zhu'da'da'de'xi'le 我靠主大大的喜乐
'wo'ke'na'shen'me'he'ni'bi'jiao 我可拿甚么和你比较
'wo'ke'xiang'ni'zen'yang'xing'ne 我可向你怎样行呢
'wo'ke'xiang'ni'zen'yang'zuo'ne 我可向你怎样做呢
'wo'ke'yi'ji'sha'ta'men'me 我可以击杀他们么
'wo'ke'yi'ming'ming'de'dui'ni'men'shuo 我可以明明的对你们说
'wo'ke'yi'wei'ni'zuo'shen'me'ne 我可以为你做甚么呢
'wo'ke'yi'zuo'ni'men'de'ling'xiu'me 我可以作你们的领袖么
'wo'ke'yong'shen'me'bi'zhe'shi'dai'ne 我可用甚么比这世代呢
'wo'ke'yong'shen'me'hua'xiang'ta'su'yuan 我可用甚么话向他诉冤
'wo'ke'yong'shen'me'xiang'ni'zheng'ming'ne 我可用甚么向你证明呢
'wo'ke'yong'shen'me'yu'ni'xiang'bi'ne 我可用甚么与你相比呢
'wo'kou'bi'xian'wo'wei'wan'qu 我口必显我为弯曲
'wo'kou'suo'chu'de'hua'shi'ping'gong'yi 我口所出的话是凭公义
'wo'kou'suo'chu'de'hua'ye'bi'ru'ci 我口所出的话也必如此
'wo'kou'yao'shuo'zhi'hui'de'yan'yu 我口要说智慧的言语
'wo'kou'zhong'de'yan'yu'dou'shi'gong'yi 我口中的言语都是公义
'wo'kui'fu'le'bie'de'jiao'hui 我亏负了别的教会
'wo'lai'ben'bu'shi'yao'shen'pan'shi'jie 我来本不是要审判世界
'wo'lai'ben'bu'shi'zhao'yi'ren 我来本不是召义人
'wo'lai'ben'bu'shi'zhao'yi'ren'hui'gai 我来本不是召义人悔改
'wo'lai'bing'bu'shi'jiao'di'shang'tai'ping 我来并不是叫地上太平
'wo'lai'bing'bu'shi'you'yu'zi'ji 我来并不是由于自己
'wo'lai'de'shi'hou'zai'an'pai 我来的时候再安排
'wo'lai'qi'mei'you'yuan'gu'me 我来岂没有缘故么
'wo'lai'shi'yao'xiang'ye'he'hua'xian'ji 我来是要向耶和华献祭
'wo'lai'yao'ba'huo'diu'zai'di'shang 我来要把火丢在地上
'wo'le'yi'zhao'ni'de'zhi'yi'xing 我乐意照你的旨意行
'wo'li'da'di'gen'ji'de'shi'hou 我立大地根基的时候
'wo'li'dang'nai'xing'ting'ni'men 我理当耐性听你们
'wo'li'ke'bei'sheng'ling'gan'dong 我立刻被圣灵感动
'wo'li'mian'de'gu'tou'ci'wo 我里面的骨头刺我
'wo'li'mian'de'ling'ji'dong'wo 我里面的灵激动我
'wo'li'mian'de'ling'qie'qie'xun'qiu'ni 我里面的灵切切寻求你
'wo'li'qi'ni'bu'guo'pian'shi 我离弃你不过片时
'wo'li'qi'shuai'ruo'de'shi'hou 我力气衰弱的时候
'wo'li'shi'de'shi'hou'dao'le 我离世的时候到了
'wo'li'ta'men'wei'ni'men'de'shou'ling 我立他们为你们的首领
'wo'lian'shang'de'xiu'kui'jiang'wo'zhe'bi 我脸上的羞愧将我遮蔽
'wo'liang'ru'xiang'qi'shang'de'lou 我两乳象其上的楼
'wo'ling'cun'huo'ye'quan'zai'ci 我灵存活也全在此
'wo'ling'ni'lai'zhou'zu'wo'de'chou'di 我领你来咒诅我的仇敌
'wo'ling'ni'men'jin'ru'fei'mei'zhi'di 我领你们进入肥美之地
'wo'ling'ni'men'jin'ru'yi'se'lie'di 我领你们进入以色列地
'wo'ling'ni'men'lie'zu'chu'ai'ji 我领你们列祖出埃及
'wo'ling'ni'men'zai'kuang'ye'si'shi'nian 我领你们在旷野四十年
'wo'ling'ta'men'chu'ai'ji'di 我领他们出埃及地
'wo'ling'yi'shen'wo'de'jiu'zhu'wei'le 我灵以神我的救主为乐
'wo'liu'xia'ping'an'gei'ni'men 我留下平安给你们
'wo'lue'lue'de'xie'le'zhe'xin 我略略的写了这信
'wo'lue'lue'xie'xin'gei'ni'men 我略略写信给你们
'wo'lun'dao'wo'wei'wang'zuo'de'shi 我论到我为王做的事
'wo'luo'dao'bei'wei'de'di'bu 我落到卑微的地步
'wo'mei'feng'jiang'lun'de'shi'hou 我每逢讲论的时候
'wo'mei'you'da'fa'na'xie'xian'zhi 我没有打发那些先知
'wo'mei'you'dui'ta'men'shuo'hua 我没有对他们说话
'wo'mei'you'dui'ya'ge'de'hou'yi'shuo 我没有对雅各的后裔说
'wo'mei'you'er'zi'wei'wo'liu'ming 我没有儿子为我留名
'wo'mei'you'he'xu'huang'ren'tong'zuo 我没有和虚谎人同坐
'wo'mei'you'jian'guo'zhe'yang'bu'hao'de 我没有见过这样不好的
'wo'mei'you'jin'zhi'bu'xiang'shou'de 我没有禁止不享受的
'wo'mei'you'liu'xia'bu'gei'ta'de 我没有留下不给他的
'wo'mei'you'pian'li'ni'de'dian'zhang 我没有偏离你的典章
'wo'mei'you'ri'guang'jiu'ai'ku'xing'qu 我没有日光就哀哭行去
'wo'mei'you'shen'me'gei'ta'bai'shang 我没有甚么给他摆上
'wo'mei'you'wen'ta'cong'na'li'lai 我没有问他从那里来
'wo'mei'you'yi'yang'bi'hui'bu'shuo'de 我没有一样避讳不说的
'wo'mei'you'yin'gong'wu'shi'ni'fu'lao 我没有因供物使你服劳
'wo'mei'you'zai'na'li'jiu'huan'xi 我没有在那里就欢喜
'wo'men'ai'qiu'ye'he'hua'de'shi'hou 我们哀求耶和华的时候
'wo'men'ba'nv'zi'jiao'lai'wen'wen'ta 我们把女子叫来问问他
'wo'men'bei'feng'lang'bi'de'shen'ji 我们被风浪逼得甚急
'wo'men'bei'kan'shou'zai'lv'fa'zhi'xia 我们被看守在律法之下
'wo'men'bei'lu'lue'di'er'shi'wu'nian 我们被掳掠第二十五年
'wo'men'ben'shi'di'xiong'shi'er'ren 我们本是弟兄十二人
'wo'men'ben'shi'duo'ci'bei'dao 我们本是多次背道
'wo'men'bi'bu'de'jian'na'ren'de'mian 我们必不得见那人的面
'wo'men'bi'ci'li'bie'yi'hou 我们彼此离别以后
'wo'men'bi'de'ge'yang'bao'wu 我们必得各样宝物
'wo'men'bi'ding'shi'feng'ye'he'hua 我们必定事奉耶和华
'wo'men'bi'ding'zhao'ni'de'hua'xing 我们必定照你的话行
'wo'men'bi'neng'yi'she'tou'de'sheng 我们必能以舌头得胜
'wo'men'bi'shi'feng'ye'he'hua 我们必事奉耶和华
'wo'men'bi'ta'hai'you'neng'li'me 我们比他还有能力么
'wo'men'bi'xu'kong'he'ta'men 我们必须恐吓他们
'wo'men'bi'yi'ci'ai'cheng'shi'dai'ni 我们必以慈爱诚实待你
'wo'men'bi'yin'ni'huan'xi'kuai'le 我们必因你欢喜快乐
'wo'men'bi'zai'zhe'di'chang'sheng 我们必在这地昌盛
'wo'men'bi'zhao'ni'suo'xu'yong'de 我们必照你所需用的
'wo'men'bi'zhao'zhe'ni'de'hua'xing 我们必照着你的话行
'wo'men'bian'bu'tui'hou'li'kai'ni 我们便不退后离开你
'wo'men'bian'ke'yi'jin'dao'shen'mian'qian 我们便可以进到神面前
'wo'men'bian'yu'ni'men'tong'zhu 我们便与你们同住
'wo'men'bing'mei'you'li'qi'ta 我们并没有离弃他
'wo'men'bing'mei'you'ting'cong'ta'de'hua 我们并没有听从他的话
'wo'men'bu'guo'cong'zuo'ri'cai'you 我们不过从昨日才有
'wo'men'bu'guo'you'wu'ge'bing 我们不过有五个饼
'wo'men'bu'jian'wo'men'de'biao'zhi 我们不见我们的标帜
'wo'men'bu'ju'shi'you'tai'ren 我们不拘是犹太人
'wo'men'bu'ke'hai'ta'de'xing'ming 我们不可害他的性命
'wo'men'bu'ke'zai'bi'ci'lun'duan 我们不可再彼此论断
'wo'men'bu'ming'bai'ta'suo'shuo'de'hua 我们不明白他所说的话
'wo'men'bu'neng'shang'qu'gong'ji'na'min 我们不能上去攻击那民

'wo'men'bu'ru'wang'ta'na'li'qu 我们不如往他那里去
'wo'men'bu'ru'yong'qiao'ji'dai'ta'men 我们不如用巧计待他们

'wo'men'bu'shi'dou'yao'shui'jiao 我们不是都要睡觉

'wo'men'bu'shi'ke'qi'jue'de'ren 我们不是可弃绝的人

'wo'men'bu'zou'tian'jian'he'pu'tao'yuan 我们不走田间和葡萄园

'wo'men'ceng'zhu'guo'ai'ji'di 我们曾住过埃及地

'wo'men'ruo'shuo'cong'tian'shang'lai 我们若说从天上来

'wo'men'ruo'shuo'zi'ji'wu'zui 我们若说自己无罪

'wo'men'ruo'zun'shou'ta'de'jie'ming 我们若遵守他的诫命

'wo'men'shi'mo'xi'de'men'tu 我们是摩西的门徒
'wo'men'shi'ni'men'de'pu'ren 我们是你们的仆人
'wo'men'shi'ping'zhe'ying'xu'zuo'er'nv 我们是凭着应许作儿女

'wo'men'suo'chuan'de'you'shui'xin'ne 我们所传的有谁信呢

'wo'men'suo'zao'yu'de'yi'qie'jian'nan 我们所遭遇的一切艰难
'wo'men'suo'zuo'de'shi'xie'e 我们所做的是邪恶

'wo'ping'zhe'zhu'ye'su'que'zhi'shen'xin 我凭着主耶稣确知深信
'wo'ping'zhe'zi'ji'bu'neng'zuo'shen'me 我凭着自己不能做甚么
'wo'qi'bei'ni'men'qiu'wen'me 我岂被你们求问么
'wo'qi'bu'chong'man'tian'di'me 我岂不充满天地么
'wo'qi'bu'da'fa'ren'gao'su'ni'me 我岂不打发人告诉你么
'wo'qi'bu'hen'e'ta'men'me 我岂不恨恶他们么
'wo'qi'bu'neng'shi'ni'dei'zun'rong'me 我岂不能使你得尊荣么
'wo'qi'bu'shi'dui'ni'men'shuo'guo 我岂不是对你们说过
'wo'qi'bu'wei'ta'ku'qi'ne 我岂不为他哭泣呢
'wo'qi'bu'wei'ta'you'chou'ne 我岂不为他忧愁呢
'wo'qi'bu'yin'zhe'xie'shi'tao'zui'ne 我岂不因这些事讨罪呢
'wo'qi'bu'zeng'xian'ta'men'me 我岂不憎嫌他们么
'wo'qi'chi'gong'niu'de'rou'ne 我岂吃公牛的肉呢
'wo'qi'he'shan'yang'de'xue'ne 我岂喝山羊的血呢
'wo'qi'ke'xiang'mu'dun'zi'kou'bai'ne 我岂可向木墩子叩拜呢
'wo'qi'mei'you'fen'fu'ni'me 我岂没有吩咐你么
'wo'qi'mei'you'xie'gei'ni'me 我岂没有写给你么
'wo'qi'neng'dai'ti'ta'zuo'zhu'ne 我岂能代替他作主呢
'wo'qi'neng'mian'wu'chou'rong'me 我岂能面无愁容么
'wo'qi'neng'shi'ta'fan'hui'ne 我岂能使他返回呢
'wo'qi'qiu'wei'yao'de'zhe'hai'zi 我祈求为要得这孩子
'wo'qi'shi'kan'shou'wo'xiong'di'de'me 我岂是看守我兄弟的么
'wo'qi'shi'tao'ren'de'xi'huan'me 我岂是讨人的喜欢么
'wo'qi'shi'ying'xu'gei'ya'bo'la'han 我起誓应许给亚伯拉罕
'wo'qi'shi'you'da'de'gou'tou'ne 我岂是犹大的狗头呢
'wo'qi'ting'ni'men'xing'zhe'da'e 我岂听你们行这大恶
'wo'qi'wu'zheng'jiu'zhi'li'me 我岂无拯救之力么
'wo'qi'xiang'yi'se'lie'zuo'kuang'ye'ne 我岂向以色列作旷野呢
'wo'qi'yao'zuo'ke'zeng'de'wu'ma 我岂要作可憎的物吗
'wo'qi'yin'ta'men'bu'shuo'hua 我岂因他们不说话
'wo'qie'qie'di'hen'e'ta'men 我切切地恨恶他们
'wo'qie'ting'jian'you'sheng'yin'xiang'wo'shuo 我且听见有声音向我说
'wo'qie'zhao'zhe'ren'de'chang'hua'shuo 我且照着人的常话说
'wo'qing'fu'ni'men'zhong'jian'de'cheng'yi 我倾覆你们中间的城邑
'wo'qing'ni'men'lai'jian'mian'shuo'hua 我请你们来见面说话
'wo'qing'yuan'yu'fei'li'shi'ren'tong'si 我情愿与非利士人同死
'wo'qing'yuan'zhao'zhe'ni'de'hua'xing 我情愿照着你的话行
'wo'qu'hai'yao'dao'ni'men'zhei'li'lai 我去还要到你们这里来
'wo'qu'shi'yu'ni'men'you'yi'de 我去是与你们有益的
'wo'qu'yao'qiang'cai'wei'lu'wu 我去要抢财为掳物
'wo'quan'ni'men'bu'yao'guan'zhe'xie'ren 我劝你们不要管这些人
'wo'quan'ni'men'shun'fu'zhe'yang'de'ren 我劝你们顺服这样的人
'wo'quan'ni'men'yao'xiang'wo'yi'yang 我劝你们要象我一样
'wo'quan'ni'zun'shou'wang'de'ming'ling 我劝你遵守王的命令
'wo'quan'you'a'die'he'xun'dou'ji 我劝友阿爹和循都基
'wo'que'bi'shi'ta'men'sang'zi 我却必使他们丧子
'wo'que'bu'chi'ni'de'shi'wu 我却不吃你的食物
'wo'que'bu'neng'bian'qi'xing'zhuang 我却不能辨其形状
'wo'que'bu'qin'shou'jia'hai'yu'ni 我却不亲手加害于你
'wo'que'bu'wang'ji'ni'de'lv'fa 我却不忘记你的律法
'wo'que'bu'yi'xing'ming'wei'nian 我却不以性命为念

'wo'que'kan'ming'you'yi'jian'shi 我却看明有一件事

'wo'que'mei'you'wang'ji'ni'de'lv'fa 我却没有忘记你的律法
'wo'que'pan'wang'ni'men'xiao'de 我却盼望你们晓得
'wo'que'reng'yao'ti'xing'ni'men 我却仍要提醒你们

'wo'que'shang'mie'ta'de'guo'zi 我却上灭他的果子

'wo'ren'nai'ta'men'yao'dao'ji'shi'ne 我忍耐他们要到几时呢

'wo'ru'jin'ruo'zai'ni'yan'qian'meng'en 我如今若在你眼前蒙恩

'wo'ruo'zai'ni'men'yan'qian'meng'en 我若在你们眼前蒙恩

'wo'si'le'bi'huo'zhe'hai'hao 我死了比活着还好
'wo'si'nian'zhe'shi'bian'ju'pa'ta 我思念这事便惧怕他

'wo'si'xiang'wo'suo'xing'de'dao 我思想我所行的道

'wo'sui'bu'zai'lv'fa'yi'xia 我虽不在律法以下

'wo'suo'ju'pa'de'ying'wo'er'lai 我所惧怕的迎我而来
'wo'suo'kan'jian'de'shi'shen'me'bei 我所看见的是甚么碑
'wo'suo'qin'ai'de'di'xiong'a 我所亲爱的弟兄阿
'wo'suo'ren'shou'shi'he'deng'de'bi'po 我所忍受是何等的逼迫
'wo'suo'shuo'de'bi'ding'cheng'jiu 我所说的必定成就
'wo'suo'shuo'de'hua'ni'yao'si'xiang 我所说的话你要思想
'wo'suo'shuo'de'shi'wo'bu'ming'bai'de 我所说的是我不明白的
'wo'suo'xi'le'ke'cheng'zan'de'cheng 我所喜乐可称赞的城
'wo'suo'yao'jian'zao'de'dian'yu'shen'da 我所要建造的殿宇甚大
'wo'suo'yao'nong'suo'yang'yu'de'ying'hai 我所摇弄所养育的婴孩
'wo'suo'yao'zao'de'xin'tian'xin'di 我所要造的新天新地
'wo'suo'yi'xing'shi'yu'ta'men'fan'dui 我所以行事与他们反对
'wo'suo'zhao'dao'de'zhi'you'yi'jian 我所找到的只有一件
'wo'suo'zhi'wang'de'shui'neng'kan'jian'ne 我所指望的谁能看见呢
'wo'suo'zuo'de'shi'ru'ci'ru'ci 我所做的事如此如此
'wo'tan'wo'fu'qin'de'yi'si 我探我父亲的意思
'wo'tang'wo'de'shi'hou'bian'shuo 我躺卧的时候便说
'wo'tao'yi'se'lie'zui'de'ri'zi 我讨以色列罪的日子
'wo'teng'tong'shen'zhi'bu'neng'ting 我疼痛甚至不能听
'wo'ti'hui'ji'du'ye'su'de'xin'chang 我体会基督耶稣的心肠
'wo'tian'suo'chan'de'bei'ba'chu'lai 我田所产的被拔出来
'wo'tian'tian'tong'ni'men'zai'dian'li 我天天同你们在殿里
'wo'tian'tian'zuo'zai'dian'li'jiao'xun'ren 我天天坐在殿里教训人
'wo'ting'jian'chi'bang'de'xiang'sheng 我听见翅膀的响声
'wo'ting'jian'cong'tian'shang'you'sheng'yin 我听见从天上有声音
'wo'ting'jian'cong'tian'shang'you'sheng'yin'shuo 我听见从天上有声音说
'wo'ting'jian'di'er'ge'huo'wu'shuo 我听见第二个活物说
'wo'ting'jian'di'san'ge'huo'wu'shuo 我听见第叁个活物说
'wo'ting'jian'di'si'ge'huo'wu'shuo 我听见第四个活物说
'wo'ting'jian'hao'xiang'qun'zhong'de'sheng'yin 我听见好象群众的声音
'wo'ting'jian'le'ni'de'dao'gao 我听见了你的祷告
'wo'ting'jian'le'xu'duo'ren'de'chan'bang 我听见了许多人的谗谤
'wo'ting'jian'na'zhan'zai'he'shui'yi'shang 我听见那站在河水以上
'wo'ting'jian'ni'men'de'feng'sheng'bu'hao 我听见你们的风声不好
'wo'ting'jian'ni'zhe'shi'zen'me'yang'ne 我听见你这事怎么样呢
'wo'ting'jian'ye'he'hua'de'sheng'yin 我听见耶和华的声音
'wo'ting'jian'you'yi'wei'sheng'zhe'shuo'hua 我听见有一位圣者说话
'wo'ting'shuo'ni'li'tou'you'shen'de'ling 我听说你里头有神的灵
'wo'ting'shuo'ni'shan'yu'jiang'jie 我听说你善于讲解
'wo'tong'mu'de'di'xiong'xiang'wo'fa'nu 我同母的弟兄向我发怒
'wo'tong'ni'suo'you'de'rong'yao 我同你所有的荣耀
'wo'tu'mo'le'ni'de'guo'fan 我涂抹了你的过犯
'wo'tu'mo'le'ni'de'zui'e 我涂抹了你的罪恶
'wo'wang'ma'ha'nian'qu'de'na'ri 我往玛哈念去的那日
'wo'wang'ma'qi'dun'qu'de'shi'hou 我往马其顿去的时候
'wo'wang'na'li'qu'cai'hao'ne 我往那里去才好呢
'wo'wang'na'li'qu'duo'bi'ni'de'ling 我往那里去躲避你的灵
'wo'wang'ta'que'bu'zai'jin'ri 我望他却不在近日
'wo'wei'ceng'bei'jie'qu'li'kai'ni 我未曾被接去离开你
'wo'wei'ceng'chi'fan'jiu'fa'chu'tan'xi 我未曾吃饭就发出叹息
'wo'wei'ceng'jian'ni'you'shen'me'guo'shi 我未曾见你有甚么过失
'wo'wei'ceng'jian'ta'you'guo'cuo 我未曾见他有过错
'wo'wei'ceng'tan'tu'yi'ge'ren'de'jin 我未曾贪图一个人的金
'wo'wei'ci'feng'pai'zuo'chuan'dao'de 我为此奉派作传道的
'wo'wei'dao'ai'ji'jian'ni'zhi'xian 我未到埃及见你之先
'wo'wei'er'zi'zen'me'cai'hao'ne 我为儿子怎么才好呢
'wo'wei'he'bu'chu'mu'tai'er'si 我为何不出母胎而死
'wo'wei'he'bu'zai'ni'yan'qian'meng'en 我为何不在你眼前蒙恩
'wo'wei'he'chu'tai'jian'lao'lu'chou'ku 我为何出胎见劳碌愁苦
'wo'wei'he'cong'ji'shu'hui'lai'ne 我为何从基述回来呢
'wo'wei'he'geng'you'zhi'hui'ne 我为何更有智慧呢
'wo'wei'jiang'ni'zao'zai'fu'zhong 我未将你造在腹中
'wo'wei'ni'de'dian'xin'li'jiao'ji 我为你的殿心里焦急
'wo'wei'ni'men'he'lao'di'jia'ren 我为你们和老底嘉人
'wo'wei'ni'men'qi'de'fen'hen 我为你们起的愤恨
'wo'wei'ni'men'zai'shou'sheng'chan'zhi'ku 我为你们再受生产之苦
'wo'wei'ni'zhao'shui'shang'lai'ne 我为你招谁上来呢
'wo'wei'shen'pan'dao'zhe'shi'shang'lai 我为审判到这世上来
'wo'wei'shou'ku'yi'xian'zou'mi'le'lu 我未受苦以先走迷了路
'wo'wei'ta'men'xuan'ze'dao'lu 我为他们选择道路
'wo'wei'ta'xie'le'lv'fa'wan'tiao 我为他写了律法万条
'wo'wei'ta'yi'jing'diu'qi'wan'shi 我为他已经丢弃万事
'wo'wei'wo'de'ming'zan'qie'ren'nu 我为我的名暂且忍怒
'wo'wei'wo'pu'tao'yuan'suo'zuo'zhi'wai 我为我葡萄园所做之外
'wo'wei'xi'an'xin'li'ji'qi'huo're 我为锡安心里极其火热
'wo'wei'ye'lu'sa'leng'wei'xi'an 我为耶路撒冷为锡安
'wo'wei'zhe'fu'yin'shou'ku'nan 我为这福音受苦难
'wo'wei'zhu'bei'qiu'de'quan'ni'men 我为主被囚的劝你们
'wo'wei'zi'ji'dong'da'gong'cheng 我为自己动大工程
'wo'wei'zi'ji'liu'xia'qi'qian'ren 我为自己留下七千人
'wo'wen'ta'men'na'xie'bei'lu'gui'hui 我问他们那些被掳归回
'wo'wen'yu'wo'shuo'hua'de'tian'shi'shuo 我问与我说话的天使说
'wo'xian'gei'ni'yi'ge'zhao'tou 我先给你一个兆头
'wo'xian'jin'fen'fu'ni'men'de'hua 我现今吩咐你们的话
'wo'xian'jin'yao'tang'wo'zai'chen'tu'zhong 我现今要躺卧在尘土中
'wo'xian'qian'xie'xin'gei'ni'men'shuo 我先前写信给你们说
'wo'xian'qian'xie'xin'jiao'ni'men'you'chou 我先前写信叫你们忧愁
'wo'xian'qian'xin'li'nan'guo'tong'ku 我先前心里难过痛苦
'wo'xian'zai'bu'shang'qu'guo'zhe'jie 我现在不上去过这节
'wo'xian'zai'dui'ni'men'fen'su 我现在对你们分诉
'wo'xian'zai'shi'yao'de'ren'de'xin'ne 我现在是要得人的心呢
'wo'xian'zai'yi'bai'er'shi'sui'le 我现在一百二十岁了
'wo'xiang'ai'ji'ren'suo'xing'de'shi 我向埃及人所行的事
'wo'xiang'bu'dao'de'jian'ni'de'mian 我想不到得见你的面
'wo'xiang'dang'shu'na'kuai'di'de'shi'ni 我想当赎那块地的是你
'wo'xiang'fang'ding'shang'gu'dan'de'ma'que 我象房顶上孤单的麻雀
'wo'xiang'jin'xin'xie'xin'gei'ni'men 我想尽心写信给你们
'wo'xiang'lai'deng'hou'ni'de'jiu'en 我向来等候你的救恩
'wo'xiang'lai'zuo'ni'fu'qin'de'pu'ren 我向来作你父亲的仆人
'wo'xiang'na'yi'ge'nv'zi'shuo 我向那一个女子说
'wo'xiang'ni'chen'ming'wo'de'zui 我向你陈明我的罪
'wo'xiang'ni'men'ke'zen'me'shuo'ne 我向你们可怎么说呢
'wo'xiang'ni'men'xuan'gao'yi'yang'zi'you 我向你们宣告一样自由
'wo'xiang'ni'zuo'le'shen'me'ne 我向你做了甚么呢
'wo'xiang'qi'wo'ye'jian'de'ge'qu 我想起我夜间的歌曲
'wo'xiang'shi'na'duo'de'en'mian'de'ren 我想是那多得恩免的人
'wo'xiang'shi'ni'de'da'zun'rong 我想使你得大尊荣
'wo'xiang'ta'bi'ding'chu'lai'jian'wo 我想他必定出来见我
'wo'xiang'ta'men'bian'lian'de'shi'hou 我向他们变脸的时候
'wo'xiang'ta'men'da'shi'bao'ying 我向他们大施报应
'wo'xiang'ta'men'tao'zui'de'shi'hou 我向他们讨罪的时候
'wo'xiang'wo'de'bai'xing'fa'nu 我向我的百姓发怒
'wo'xiang'yi'zhi'yi'se'lie'de'shi'hou 我想医治以色列的时候
'wo'xiang'zhe'bai'xing'zen'yang'xing'ne 我向这百姓怎样行呢
'wo'xie'gei'ni'men'de'bu'shi'huang'hua 我写给你们的不是谎话
'wo'xie'xin'gei'ni'men'zai'luo'ma 我写信给你们在罗马
'wo'xin'fu'wei'mo'ya'ai'ming'ru'qin 我心腹为摩押哀鸣如琴
'wo'xin'fu'wei'mo'ya'ai'ming'ru'xiao 我心腹为摩押哀鸣如箫
'wo'xin'jin'jin'de'gen'sui'ni 我心紧紧地跟随你
'wo'xin'jiu'yu'ni'men'xiang'qi 我心就与你们相契
'wo'xin'ke'xiang'ni'de'jiu'en 我心渴想你的救恩
'wo'xin'li'ben'xiang'jian'zao'dian'yu 我心里本想建造殿宇
'wo'xin'li'de'chou'ku'shen'duo 我心里的愁苦甚多
'wo'xin'li'de'hua'hai'mei'you'shuo'wan 我心里的话还没有说完
'wo'xin'li'fa'hun'de'shi'hou 我心里发昏的时候
'wo'xin'li'jiu'bu'xi'huan'ta 我心里就不喜欢他
'wo'xin'li'shou'le'ni'de'fa'du 我心里守了你的法度
'wo'xin'li'ye'zi'xi'xing'cha 我心里也仔细省察
'wo'xin'li'yi'kao'ta'jiu'dei'bang'zhu 我心里倚靠他就得帮助
'wo'xin'qing'xiang'yi'se'lie'de'shou'ling 我心倾向以色列的首领
'wo'xin'que'reng'yi'zhi'hui'yin'dao'wo 我心却仍以智慧引导我
'wo'xin'shen'ta'zen'yang'dui'wo'shuo 我信神他怎样对我说
'wo'xin'suo'xiang'wang'de'yi'jing'duan'jue 我心所想望的已经断绝
'wo'xin'xian'mu'chu'shu'de'wu'hua'guo 我心羡慕初熟的无花果
'wo'xin'yao'xiang'tong'da'de'dao'li 我心要想通达的道理
'wo'xin'ye'da'da'de'jing'huang 我心也大大地惊惶
'wo'xin'zai'wo'li'mian'fa'hun 我心在我里面发昏
'wo'xin'zai'wo'li'mian'fan'zao'bu'an 我心在我里面烦躁不安
'wo'xin'zai'wo'li'mian'fan'zhuan 我心在我里面翻转
'wo'xin'zai'wo'li'mian'ru'la'rong'hua 我心在我里面如蜡熔化

'wo'xin'zai'wo'li'mian'you'shang 我心在我里面忧伤
'wo'xue'le'ni'gong'yi'de'pan'yu 我学了你公义的判语
'wo'xun'de'wo'de'pu'ren'da'wei 我寻得我的仆人大卫
'wo'xun'de'ye'xi'de'er'zi'da'wei 我寻得耶西的儿子大卫
'wo'ya'lao'na'dou'feng'gei'ni 我亚劳拿都奉给你
'wo'yan'chang'jian'ta'men're'dong'wo 我眼常见他们惹动我
'wo'yan'fan'na'shi'dai'de'ren 我厌烦那世代的人
'wo'yan'jing'kan'jian'chou'di'zao'bao 我眼睛看见仇敌遭报
'wo'yan'neng'shi'wo'de'ming'bei'xie'du 我焉能使我的名被亵渎
'wo'yan'wu'ni'men'de'jie'qi 我厌恶你们的节期
'wo'yan'yao'kan'guo'zhong'de'cheng'shi'ren 我眼要看国中的诚实人
'wo'yang'wang'le'ni'de'jiu'en 我仰望了你的救恩
'wo'yang'wang'le'ni'de'yan'yu 我仰望了你的言语
'wo'yao'an'jing'bu'zai'nao'nu 我要安静不再恼怒
'wo'yao'ba'fei'niu'zuo'fan'ji 我要把肥牛作燔祭
'wo'yao'ba'gan'xin'ji'xian'gei'ni 我要把甘心祭献给你
'wo'yao'ba'ni'men'ling'jin'qu 我要把你们领进去

'wo'yao'ba'qi'shi'xian'gei'ta'men'kan 我要把奇事显给他们看
'wo'yao'ba'ta'an'zhi'zai'gao'chu 我要把他安置在高处
'wo'yao'ba'ta'men'san'zai'lie'bang'zhong 我要把他们散在列邦中
'wo'yao'ba'tian'guo'de'yao'shi'gei'ni 我要把天国的钥匙给你

'wo'yao'cha'ni'wang'ai'ji'qu 我要差你往埃及去

'wo'yao'ci'gei'ni'yu'ni'de'hou'yi 我要赐给你与你的后裔
'wo'yao'ci'ta'men'ren'shi'wo'de'xin 我要赐他们认识我的心

'wo'yao'da'fa'ni'qu'jian'fa'lao 我要打发你去见法老
'wo'yao'da'fa'wo'de'ai'zi'qu 我要打发我的爱子去
'wo'yao'dao'na'an'jing'de'min'na'li 我要到那安静的民那里
'wo'yao'dui'shou'ge'de'ren'shuo 我要对收割的人说

'wo'yao'en'dai'shui'jiu'en'dai'shui 我要恩待谁就恩待谁

'wo'yao'feng'ni'de'ming'ju'shou 我要奉你的名举手

'wo'yao'ge'chang'ye'he'hua'de'ci'ai 我要歌唱耶和华的慈爱

'wo'yao'he'ni'tong'xia'ai'ji'qu 我要和你同下埃及去
'wo'yao'hui'ben'di'ben'zu'na'li'qu 我要回本地本族那里去
'wo'yao'ji'fa'ni'de'zhong'zi 我要激发你的众子
'wo'yao'ji'nian'ni'gu'shi'de'qi'shi 我要纪念你古时的奇事
'wo'yao'jia'zeng'ni'de'hou'yi 我要加增你的后裔
'wo'yao'jian'ding'yu'ni'suo'li'de'yue 我要坚定与你所立的约
'wo'yao'jian'li'ni'de'hou'yi 我要建立你的后裔
'wo'yao'jiang'dang'shuo'de'hua'chuan'gei'ta 我要将当说的话传给他
'wo'yao'jiang'gan'xie'ji'xian'gei'ni 我要将感谢祭献给你
'wo'yao'jiang'meng'de'jiang'jie'gao'su'wang 我要将梦的讲解告诉王
'wo'yao'jiang'na'di'ci'gei'ta'men 我要将那地赐给他们
'wo'yao'jiang'ni'xian'zai'ji'ju'de'di 我要将你现在寄居的地
'wo'yao'jiang'suo'zao'de'ren'he'zou'shou 我要将所造的人和走兽
'wo'yao'jiang'ta'men'ba'chu'ben'di 我要将他们拔出本地
'wo'yao'jiang'ta'men'jin'xing'mie'jue 我要将他们尽行灭绝
'wo'yao'jiang'ta'men'rong'hua'ao'lian 我要将他们融化熬炼
'wo'yao'jiang'ta'men'zai'yu'ben'di 我要将他们栽于本地
'wo'yao'jiang'wo'de'ling'ci'gei'ta 我要将我的灵赐给他
'wo'yao'jiang'wo'de'ling'jiao'guan'ni'men 我要将我的灵浇灌你们
'wo'yao'jiang'zhe'di'ci'gei'ni'men 我要将这地赐给你们
'wo'yao'jiao'ni'xia'ru'yin'fu 我要叫你下入阴府

'wo'yao'kuan'shu'ta'men'de'bu'yi 我要宽恕他们的不义
'wo'yao'lian'min'shui'jiu'lian'min'shui 我要怜悯谁就怜悯谁
'wo'yao'ling'ni'men'dao'de'jia'nan'di 我要领你们到的迦南地
'wo'yao'lun'dao'ye'he'hua'shuo 我要论到耶和华说
'wo'yao'mie'jue'zhi'hui'ren'de'zhi'hui 我要灭绝智慧人的智慧
'wo'yao'ming'ding'ni'men'gui'zai'dao'xia 我要命定你们归在刀下
'wo'yao'mo'xiang'ni'de'xun'ci 我要默想你的训词
'wo'yao'na'jin'zi'dai'ti'tong 我要拿金子代替铜
'wo'yao'ping'cheng'shi'shi'xing'bao'ying 我要凭诚实施行报应
'wo'yao'ping'ni'de'kou'ding'ni'de'zui 我要凭你的口定你的罪
'wo'yao'qie'qie'di'xun'qiu'ni 我要切切地寻求你
'wo'yao'qin'zi'diao'ke'zhe'shi'tou 我要亲自雕刻这石头
'wo'yao'qu'jian'zun'da'de'ren 我要去见尊大的人
'wo'yao'ren'shou'ye'he'hua'de'nao'nu 我要忍受耶和华的恼怒
'wo'yao'ri'ying'wang'hou'tui'shi'du 我要日影往后退十度
'wo'yao'ru'mo'sheng'suo'de'shou'ling 我要辱没圣所的首领
'wo'yao'sha'wo'de'xiong'di'ya'ge 我要杀我的兄弟雅各
'wo'yao'shang'na'wu'cheng'qiang'de'xiang'cun 我要上那无城墙的乡村
'wo'yao'shang'qu'gao'su'fa'lao 我要上去告诉法老
'wo'yao'she'mian'ta'men'de'zui'nie 我要赦免他们的罪孽
'wo'yao'shen'duan'ni'men'de'shi 我要审断你们的事
'wo'yao'sheng'dao'gao'yun'zhi'shang 我要升到高云之上
'wo'yao'sheng'shang'qu'jian'wo'de'fu 我要升上去见我的父
'wo'yao'shi'ai'ji'di'de'ren'ju'pa 我要使埃及地的人惧怕
'wo'yao'shi'ai'ji'ren'de'xin'gang'ying 我要使埃及人的心刚硬

'wo'yi'wei'zai'yi'lan'sheng'shu'shan'cheng 我以为在以拦省书珊城
'wo'yi'xin'qiu'guo'ni'de'en 我一心求过你的恩
'wo'yi'yong'yuan'de'ai'ai'ni 我以永远的爱爱你
'wo'yi'zhao'hu'bian'dou'li'zhu 我一招呼便都立住
'wo'yi'zhi'jiao'ni'zou'zhi'hui'de'dao 我已指教你走智慧的道
'wo'yin'ci'bi'yu'ni'men'zheng'bian 我因此必与你们争辩
'wo'yin'ni'de'zui'nie'shen'da 我因你的罪孽甚大
'wo'yin'ni'gong'yi'de'dian'zhang 我因你公义的典章

'wo'yin'xi'an'bi'bu'jing'mo 我因锡安必不静默

'wo'yin'ye'he'hua'de'jiu'en'huan'xin 我因耶和华的救恩欢欣
'wo'yin'yi'qie'di'ren'cheng'le'xiu'ru 我因一切敌人成了羞辱
'wo'yin'you'chou'yan'jing'qian'bie 我因忧愁眼睛乾瘪
'wo'yin'yu'ni'li'yue'de'xue 我因与你立约的血
'wo'ying'zhe'lian'mian'hao'xiang'jian'shi 我硬着脸面好象坚石
'wo'yong'bu'wang'ji'ni'de'xun'ci 我永不忘记你的训词

'wo'yong'sheng'yin'hu'yu'de'shi'hou 我用声音呼吁的时候

'wo'you'ju'hua'yao'dui'ni'shuo 我有句话要对你说

'wo'zhu'wei'he'fen'fu'xing'zhe'shi 我主为何吩咐行这事

'wo'zi'ji'bing'mei'you'lei'zhe'ni'men 我自己并没有累着你们

'wo'zi'ji'ye'yuan'ting'zhe'ren'bian'lun 我自己也愿听这人辩论
'wo'zong'bu'shou'ta'de'xia'zhi 我总不受他的辖制

'wo'zui'chun'yao'cheng'shi'de'shuo'chu 我嘴唇要诚实地说出
'wo'zuo'le'zhe'fu'yin'de'zhi'shi 我作了这福音的执事
'wo'zuo'ye'yu'fu'qin'tong'qin 我昨夜与父亲同寝
'wo'zuo'zhe'shi'shi'xin'zheng'shou'jie'de 我作这事是心正手洁的
'wu'bing'de'ren'yong'bu'zhao'yi'sheng 无病的人用不着医生
'wu'bu'kou'cheng'ye'su'ji'du'wei'zhu 无不口称耶稣基督为主
'wu'can'ji'de'gong'mian'yang'yi'zhi 无残疾的公绵羊一只
'wu'dan'er'wu'yan'qi'ke'chi'me 物淡而无盐岂可吃么
'wu'dian'wu'de'gao'yang'zhi'xue 无玷污的羔羊之血
'wu'er'de'er'zi'yi'li'fa'le 吾珥的儿子以利法勒
'wu'fei'shi'ren'suo'neng'shou'de 无非是人所能受的
'wu'ge'an'zai'dian'men'de'you'bian 五个安在殿门的右边
'wu'ge'fang'zai'dian'men'de'zuo'bian 五个放在殿门的左边
'wu'gu'de'jia'zeng'wo'de'sun'shang 无故地加增我的损伤
'wu'gu'de'ren'chi'xiao'ta'men 无辜的人嗤笑他们

'xi'mian'yi'yi'fa'liu'fen'zhi'yi 细面一伊法六分之一
'xi'mian'zhi'pai'de'di'ye'zhong 西缅支派的地业中
'xi'mian'zhi'pai'zhong'you'yi'wan'er'qian 西缅支派中有一万二千
'xi'na'da'de'zi'sun'bin'nei 希拿达的子孙宾内
'xi'na'ren'san'qian'jiu'bai'san'shi'ming 西拿人叁千九百叁十名
'xi'na'ren'san'qian'liu'bai'san'shi'ming 西拿人叁千六百叁十名
'xi'pa'de'er'zi'men'chang'zai'yi'chu 悉帕的儿子们常在一处
'xi'pang'de'liu'shu'huan'rao'ta 溪旁的柳树环绕它
'xi'po'la'jiu'na'yi'kuai'huo'shi 西坡拉就拿一块火石
'xi'po'la'sheng'le'yi'ge'er'zi 西坡拉生了一个儿子
'xi'shi'ben'he'shu'cheng'de'jiao'ye 希实本和属城的郊野
'xi'si'lun'shi'fa'le'si'de'er'zi 希斯仑是法勒斯的儿子
'xi'xi'jia'da'you'zun'rong'zi'cai 希西家大有尊荣赀财
'xi'xi'jia'de'er'zi'shi'ma'na'xi 希西家的儿子是玛拿西
'xi'xi'jia'dui'yi'sai'ya'shuo 希西家对以赛亚说
'xi'xi'jia'gong'ji'fei'li'shi'ren 希西家攻击非利士人
'xi'xi'jia'he'zhong'min'dou'xi'le 希西家和众民都喜乐
'xi'xi'jia'he'zhong'shou'ling'lai 希西家和众首领来
'xi'xi'jia'jian'xi'na'ji'li'lai 希西家见西拿基立来
'xi'xi'jia'jiu'zhuan'lian'chao'qiang 希西家就转脸朝墙
'xi'xi'jia'ting'cong'shi'zhe'de'hua 希西家听从使者的话
'xi'xi'jia'wang'qing'zao'qi'lai 希西家王清早起来
'xi'xi'jia'wei'ta'men'dao'gao'shuo 希西家为他们祷告说
'xi'xi'jia'wen'yi'sai'ya'shuo 希西家问以赛亚说
'xi'xi'jia'xi'huan'jian'shi'zhe 希西家喜欢见使者
'xi'xi'jia'xiang'ye'he'hua'dao'gao'shuo 希西家向耶和华祷告说
'xi'xi'jia'yu'ta'lie'zu'tong'shui 希西家与他列祖同睡
'xi'xi'jia'zai'wei'de'shi'hou 希西家在位的时候
'xi'xi'jia'zuo'you'da'wang'de'shi'hou 希西家作犹大王的时候
'xi'xi'la'de'le'cai'yi'wei'lu'wu 西西拉得了彩衣为掳物
'xi'xi'la'jiu'jin'le'ta'de'zhang'peng 西西拉就进了他的帐棚
'xi'xi'la'xia'che'bu'xing'tao'pao 西西拉下车步行逃跑
'xi'xi'la'you'dui'ya'yi'shuo 西西拉又对雅亿说
'xia'bo'he'lun'zuo'wei'bao'zhang 下伯和仑作为保障
'xia'dao'ji'jing'zhong'de'ye'dou'bu'neng 下到寂静中的也都不能
'xia'dao'yao'jiang'de'jia'li'qu 下到窑匠的家里去
'xia'jia'ren'dao'zai'ta'men'shou'xia 夏甲人倒在他们手下
'xia'liu'de'shui'quan'ran'duan'jue 下流的水全然断绝
'xia'liu'ren'zai'shi'ren'zhong'sheng'gao 下流人在世人中升高
'xia'suo'bi'cheng'wei'ye'gou'de'zhu'chu 夏琐必成为野狗的住处
'xia'suo'wang'ye'bin'ting'jian'zhe'shi 夏琐王耶宾听见这事
'xia'tian'he'dong'tian'shi'ni'suo'ding'de 夏天和冬天是你所定的
'xia'yan'shuang'da'huai'ta'men'de'sang'shu 下严霜打坏他们的桑树
'xia'zai'ha'mi'le'de'er'zi 下在哈米勒的儿子
'xia'zai'jian'li'de'shi'fang'le 下在监里的释放了
'xia'zhi'ta'men'de'ren'hu'jiao 辖制他们的人呼叫
'xia'zhi'xian'qian'qi'ya'ta'men'de 辖制先前欺压他们的
'xia'zi'jiu'lai'dao'ta'gen'qian 瞎子就来到他跟前
'xian'chu'lan'bao'shi'de'xing'zhuang 显出蓝宝石的形状
'xian'chu'shi'tu'de'ping'ju'lai 显出使徒的凭据来
'xian'chu'shi'wei'shou'ge'li'de 显出是未受割礼的
'xian'chu'you'ren'shou'de'yang'shi 显出有人手的样式
'xian'cong'wo'jia'men'chu'lai'ying'jie'wo 先从我家门出来迎接我
'xian'du'dao'na'bian'bo'sai'da'qu 先渡到那边伯赛大去
'xian'fan'ji'huo'shi'ping'an'ji 献燔祭或是平安祭
'xian'fan'ji'zai'ye'he'hua'de'tan'shang 献燔祭在耶和华的坛上
'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'wei'fan'ji 献给耶和华为燔祭
'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'wei'huo'ji 献给耶和华为火祭
'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'wei'ju'ji 献给耶和华为举祭
'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'wei'xin'xiang'de'ji 献给耶和华为馨香的祭
'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'wei'xin'xiang'zhi'ji 献给耶和华为馨香之祭
'xian'ji'de'yu'bu'xian'ji'de 献祭的与不献祭的
'xian'jian'de'yu'suo'zai'na'li 先见的寓所在那里
'xian'jin'de'shi'zao'xian'jiu'you'le 现今的事早先就有了
'xian'jin'dou'bi'hai'sha'geng'zhong 现今都比海沙更重
'xian'jin'dou'dao'wo'zhe'li'lai'le 现今都到我这里来了
'xian'jin'dou'zai'ye'he'hua'de'tan'qian 现今都在耶和华的坛前
'xian'jin'jiu'tuo'li'le'lv'fa 现今就脱离了律法
'xian'jin'li'zai'ha'man'jia'li 现今立在哈曼家里
'xian'jin'ni'men'jing'yi'zhang'kuang'kua'kou 现今你们竟以张狂夸口
'xian'jin'que'shi'en'lian'xu'ni 现今却施恩怜恤你
'xian'jin'que'you'xiong'shou'ju'zhu 现今却有凶手居住
'xian'jin'ta'men'zui'shang'jia'zui 现今他们罪上加罪
'xian'jin'wo'ba'shi'wu'sui'le 现今我八十五岁了
'xian'jin'wo'hui'dao'ye'lu'sa'leng 现今我回到耶路撒冷
'xian'jin'wo'men'dou'zai'shen'mian'qian 现今我们都在神面前
'xian'jin'yao'ji'nian'ta'men'de'zui'nie 现今要纪念他们的罪孽
'xian'jin'yuan'ye'he'hua'yu'ni'tong'zai 现今愿耶和华与你同在
'xian'jin'zai'ji'tan'de'pang'bian 现今在祭坛的旁边
'xian'jin'zai'jie'shang'bian'wei'gu'han 现今在街上变为孤寒
'xian'jin'zai'ye'he'hua'de'hui'zhong 现今在耶和华的会中
'xian'mei'ri'suo'dang'xian'de'ji 献每日所当献的祭
'xian'ming'dou'bu'shi'shu'wo'men'de 显明都不是属我们的
'xian'ming'gei'hou'lai'de'shi'dai'kan 显明给后来的世代看
'xian'ming'zhe'shi'de'zhu'shuo'de 显明这事的主说的
'xian'ni'de'shu'zui'ji'he'fan'ji 献你的赎罪祭和燔祭
'xian'ping'an'ji'gei'ye'he'hua'de 献平安祭给耶和华的
'xian'ping'an'ji'sheng'xue'he'zhi'you'de 献平安祭牲血和脂油的
'xian'qian'ci'gei'ni'de'qun'zhong 先前赐给你的群众
'xian'qian'da'wei'gong'ji'yi'dong 先前大卫攻击以东
'xian'qian'de'shi'yi'jing'cheng'jiu 先前的事已经成就
'xian'qian'de'yi'se'lie'di'wei'ye'de 先前得以色列地为业的
'xian'qian'li'fa'yin'ren'zhu'zai'na'li 先前利乏音人住在那里
'xian'qian'man'you'ren'min'de'cheng 先前满有人民的城
'xian'qian'ya'lan'ren'cheng'qun'di'chu'qu 先前亚兰人成群地出去
'xian'qian'zai'lie'guo'zhong'wei'da'de 先前在列国中为大的
'xian'qian'zai'zhu'sheng'zhong'wei'wang'hou'de 先前在诸省中为王后的
'xian'qu'diao'zi'ji'yan'zhong'de'liang'mu 先去掉自己眼中的梁木
'xian'shang'mo'xi'suo'fen'fu'de'li'wu 献上摩西所吩咐的礼物
'xian'shi'meng'pai'guan'li'wo'men 先是蒙派管理我们
'xian'wan'ji'de'shi'hou'wo'qi'lai 献晚祭的时候我起来
'xian'xi'jing'bei'pan'de'li'mian 先洗净杯盘的里面
'xian'yi'fa'lian'shan'di'zhai'xiao 嫌以法莲山地窄小
'xian'yi'qian'xi'sheng'wei'fan'ji 献一千牺牲为燔祭
'xian'yu'ni'men'bi'ci'jiao'wang 先与你们彼此交往
'xian'yu'ye'he'hua'wei'fan'ji 献与耶和华为燔祭
'xian'yu'ye'he'hua'wei'ping'an'ji 献与耶和华为平安祭
'xian'zai'bi'ji'nian'ta'men'de'zui'nie 现在必纪念他们的罪孽
'xian'zai'bi'you'ren'lun'ji'ya'ge 现在必有人论及雅各
'xian'zai'da'fa'ren'lai'bao'gao'wo'zhu 现在打发人来报告我主
'xian'zai'de'zhi'shen'bai'ban'de'zhi'hui 现在得知神百般的智慧
'xian'zai'hai'dang'zhe'yang'xing'me 现在还当这样行么
'xian'zai'he'ni'shuo'hua'de'jiu'shi'ta 现在和你说话的就是他
'xian'zai'huo'zhe'de'bu'zai'shi'wo 现在活着的不再是我
'xian'zai'ji'ni'shi'jian'gu'cheng'huang'fei 现在藉你使坚固城荒废
'xian'zai'jiang'zhe'xie'shi'bao'gei'ni'men 现在将这些事报给你们
'xian'zai'ju'min'que'dou'tao'pao 现在居民却都逃跑
'xian'zai'ke'yi'bu'ta'men'de'bu'zu 现在可以补他们的不足
'xian'zai'ni'bi'cong'zhe'di'shou'zhou'zu 现在你必从这地受咒诅
'xian'zai'ni'bu'yao'yi'ta'wei'wu'zui 现在你不要以他为无罪
'xian'zai'ni'de'jie'ju'yi'jing'lin'dao 现在你的结局已经临到
'xian'zai'ni'de'qi'zi'zai'zhe'li 现在你的妻子在这里
'xian'zai'ni'de'wang'wei'bi'bu'chang'jiu 现在你的王位必不长久
'xian'zai'ni'de'wang'zai'na'li'ne 现在你的王在那里呢
'xian'zai'ni'fu'qin'bu'wei'lv'gua'xin 现在你父亲不为驴挂心
'xian'zai'ni'gei'ta'men'xue'he 现在你给他们血喝
'xian'zai'ni'men'bu'ke'xie'man 现在你们不可亵慢
'xian'zai'ni'men'bu'yao'hai'pa 现在你们不要害怕
'xian'zai'ni'men'dang'ting'wo'shuo 现在你们当听我说
'xian'zai'ni'men'dou'ting'jian'le 现在你们都听见了
'xian'zai'ni'men'hai'fan'an'xi'ri 现在你们还犯安息日
'xian'zai'ni'men'ji'ran'ren'shi'shen 现在你们既然认识神
'xian'zai'ni'men'kan'zhe'ru'he 现在你们看着如何
'xian'zai'ni'men'qu'zuo'gong'ba 现在你们去做工罢
'xian'zai'ni'men'que'xiang'yao'sha'wo 现在你们却想要杀我
'xian'zai'ni'men'shi'bei'zhou'zu'de 现在你们是被咒诅的
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'jiang'meng'gao'su'wo 现在你们要将梦告诉我
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'jie'jing'zi'ji 现在你们要洁净自己
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'jing'wei'ye'he'hua 现在你们要敬畏耶和华
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'qu'qi'zhi'gong'niu 现在你们要取七只公牛
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'que'shi'di'zhi'dao 现在你们要确实地知道
'xian'zai'ni'men'yao'zhuan'xiang'wo 现在你们要转向我
'xian'zai'ni'men'ying'dang'an'zhe'zhi'pai 现在你们应当按着支派
'xian'zai'ni'men'ying'dang'li'ding'xin'yi 现在你们应当立定心意
'xian'zai'ni'men'zheng'shi'zhe'yang 现在你们正是这样
'xian'zai'ni'qu'ling'zhe'bai'xing 现在你去领这百姓
'xian'zai'ni'que'xiang'hai'zhong'de'da'yu 现在你却象海中的大鱼
'xian'zai'ni'reng'shi'wo'men'de'fu 现在你仍是我们的父
'xian'zai'ni'ruo'neng'du'zhe'wen'zi 现在你若能读这文字
'xian'zai'ni'shou'xia'you'shen'me 现在你手下有甚么
'xian'zai'ni'sui'ran'xiang'ni'fu'jia 现在你虽然想你父家
'xian'zai'ni'wei'he'da'sheng'ku'hao'ne 现在你为何大声哭号呢
'xian'zai'ni'wei'shen'me'dan'yan'ne 现在你为甚么耽延呢
'xian'zai'ni'yao'chuai'mo'si'xiang 现在你要揣摩思想
'xian'zai'ni'yao'da'fa'ren'qu 现在你要打发人去
'xian'zai'ni'yao'dai'shi'ge'bing 现在你要带十个饼
'xian'zai'ni'yao'ju'ji'cheng'dui 现在你要聚集成队
'xian'zai'ni'yao'ting'wo'de'hua 现在你要听我的话
'xian'zai'ni'yao'ting'ye'he'hua'de'hua 现在你要听耶和华的话
'xian'zai'ni'yao'xie'yi'pian'ge 现在你要写一篇歌
'xian'zai'qing'ni'men'kan'kan'wo 现在请你们看看我
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'bu'yao'yi'wei'xiao 现在求你不要以为小
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'cha'yi'ge'qiao'jiang'lai 现在求你差一个巧匠来
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'he'wo'men'tong'qu 现在求你和我们同去
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'li'zhe'jin'ling 现在求你立这禁令
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'men'yu'wo'men'li'yue 现在求你们与我们立约
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'qu'wo'de'ming'ba 现在求你取我的命吧
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'rong'pu'ren'zhu'xia 现在求你容仆人住下
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'she'mian'wo'de'zui 现在求你赦免我的罪
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'ting'bi'nv'de'hua 现在求你听婢女的话
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'ying'yan'zhe'hua 现在求你应验这话
'xian'zai'qiu'ni'yu'wo'men'li'yue 现在求你与我们立约
'xian'zai'qiu'zhu'da'xian'neng'li 现在求主大显能力
'xian'zai'que'shi'ni'men'de'shi'hou 现在却是你们的时候
'xian'zai'que'zun'shou'ni'de'hua 现在却遵守你的话
'xian'zai'que'zuo'le'shen'de'zi'min 现在却作了神的子民
'xian'zai'ren'hai'yao'yu'ta'xing'yin 现在人还要与他行淫
'xian'zai'shi'qing'hai'mei'you'cheng'jiu 现在事情还没有成就
'xian'zai'suo'ting'jian'de'yi'yang 现在所听见的一样
'xian'zai'ta'chu'lai'ying'jie'ni 现在他出来迎接你
'xian'zai'ta'men'jian'zhu'shu'lou 现在他们建筑戍楼
'xian'zai'ta'men'xiang'ni'suo'xing'de 现在他们向你所行的
'xian'zai'ta'men'xin'li'nao'nu 现在他们心里恼怒
'xian'zai'ta'que'diu'qi'wo'men 现在他却丢弃我们
'xian'zai'ta'yin'wei'shen'xin'ni'men 现在他因为深信你们
'xian'zai'wei'he'wu'gu'yao'sha'da'wei 现在为何无故要杀大卫
'xian'zai'wei'shen'me'shi'tan'shen 现在为甚么试探神
'xian'zai'wo'hai'quan'ni'men'fang'xin 现在我还劝你们放心
'xian'zai'wo'hai'shi'jiao'gei'ni 现在我还是交给你
'xian'zai'wo'ji'shi'en'dai'ni'men 现在我既是恩待你们
'xian'zai'wo'jiang'jin'yin'song'gei'ni 现在我将金银送给你
'xian'zai'wo'jiang'xin'shi'shuo'ming 现在我将新事说明
'xian'zai'wo'jiang'zhen'shi'zhi'shi'ni 现在我将真事指示你
'xian'zai'wo'men'bu'neng'hai'ta'men 现在我们不能害他们
'xian'zai'wo'men'bu'ru'yao'shu'ma'bu 现在我们不如腰束麻布
'xian'zai'wo'men'dang'zen'yang'ban'li 现在我们当怎样办理
'xian'zai'wo'men'dao'ni'zhei'li'lai 现在我们到你这里来
'xian'zai'wo'men'de'xin'xue'ku'jie'le 现在我们的心血枯竭了
'xian'zai'wo'men'zai'ni'shou'zhong 现在我们在你手中
'xian'zai'wo'quan'ni'men'ken'qiu'shen 现在我劝你们恳求神
'xian'zai'wo'que'bu'shi'na'yang 现在我却不是那样
'xian'zai'wo'shi'ni'yan'jing'kan'jian'le 现在我使你眼睛看见了
'xian'zai'wo'wang'ni'na'li'qu 现在我往你那里去
'xian'zai'wo'wang'ye'he'hua'de'dian'qu 现在我往耶和华的殿去
'xian'zai'wo'wang'ye'lu'sa'leng'qu 现在我往耶路撒冷去
'xian'zai'wo'wei'ni'men'shou'ku 现在我为你们受苦
'xian'zai'wo'xin'ji'qi'bei'shang 现在我心极其悲伤
'xian'zai'wo'yao'gei'ba'li'xian'da'ji 现在我要给巴力献大祭
'xian'zai'wo'yao'hui'ben'zu'qu 现在我要回本族去
'xian'zai'wo'yi'xuan'ze'zhe'dian 现在我已选择这殿
'xian'zai'wo'you'bi'fa'chu'pan'yu 现在我又必发出判语
'xian'zai'wo'you'yi'jian'shi'qiu'ni 现在我有一件事求你
'xian'zai'wo'zhan'zai'zhe'li'shou'shen 现在我站在这里受审
'xian'zai'wo'zhi'dao'ni'shi'jing'wei 现在我知道你是敬畏
'xian'zai'ya'duo'ni'ya'zuo'wang'le 现在亚多尼雅作王了
'xian'zai'yao'kan'jian'zhe'yi'qie 现在要看见这一切
'xian'zai'yao'ting'ye'he'hua'de'hua 现在要听耶和华的话
'xian'zai'yao'xu'wo'jian'wang'de'mian 现在要许我见王的面
'xian'zai'yao'ying'yan'jing'shang'de'hua 现在要应验经上的话
'xian'zai'ye'bi'zhao'yang'ting'cong'ni 现在也必照样听从你
'xian'zai'ye'he'hua'de'tan'shang 献在耶和华的坛上
'xian'zai'ye'he'hua'yao'fang'ta'men 现在耶和华要放他们
'xian'zai'yi'jing'ba'shi'si'sui 现在已经八十四岁
'xian'zai'yi'jing'zai'shi'shang'le 现在已经在世上了
'xian'zai'you'ji'ge'you'da'ren 现在有几个犹大人
'xian'zai'you'liu'lei'de'gao'su'ni'men 现在又流泪的告诉你们

'xin'li'xi'yue'xing'ke'zeng'wu'de'shi 心里喜悦行可憎恶的事
'xin'li'xiang'da'wei'jue'bu'neng'jin'qu 心里想大卫决不能进去
'xin'li'zai'de'sa'zuo'wang'qi'ri 心利在得撒作王七日
'xin'ma'de'er'zi'shi'yue'ya 薪玛的儿子是约亚

'xin'shi'bi'dang'ta'xie'xia'de'dai'zi 信实必当他胁下的带子
'xin'ta'de'xian'zhi'jiu'bi'heng'tong 信他的先知就必亨通
'xin'wo'de'ren'jiu'ru'jing'shang'suo'shuo 信我的人就如经上所说
'xin'wo'de'ren'sui'ran'si'le 信我的人虽然死了
'xin'xin'mei'you'xing'wei'ye'shi'si'de 信心没有行为也是死的

'xin'zi'shang'you'shi'zi'he'niu 心子上有狮子和牛

'ya'ge'de'liang'ge'er'zi 雅各的两个儿子

'ya'sha'long'jiu'hui'zi'ji'jia'li'qu 押沙龙就回自己家里去
'ya'sha'long'jiu'jiao'ta'guo'lai 押沙龙就叫他过来

'ye'ba'wo'de'jiao'shang'le'mu'gou 也把我的脚上了木狗

'ye'bi'an'ni'de'xing'wei'shen'pan'ni 也必按你的行为审判你
'ye'bi'bu'an'lv'fa'mie'wang 也必不按律法灭亡
'ye'bi'bu'jiao'wo'de'xin'shi'fei'qi 也必不叫我的信实废弃
'ye'bi'ce'er'ting'ta'men'de'qi'qiu 也必侧耳听他们的祈求
'ye'bi'cheng'wei'lie'guo'de'lu'wu 也必成为列国的掳物
'ye'bi'cong'ni'guo'zhong'chu'mie'cheng'yi 也必从你国中除灭城邑
'ye'bi'fan'shou'gong'ji'yi'ge'lun 也必反手攻击以革伦
'ye'bi'gu'xi'ta'de'zhu'chu 也必顾惜他的住处
'ye'bi'he'ta'yi'tong'de'rong'yao 也必和他一同得荣耀
'ye'bi'he'ta'yi'tong'zuo'wang 也必和他一同作王
'ye'bi'hui'mie'ni'men'de'qiu'tan 也必毁灭你们的邱坛
'ye'bi'jiang'ni'cong'qi'shang'zhai'xia'lai 也必将你从其上摘下来
'ye'bi'jiang'zhe'di'ci'gei'ni'men 也必将这地赐给你们
'ye'bi'jiu'wo'jin'ta'de'tian'guo 也必救我进他的天国
'ye'bi'meng'ye'he'hua'de'en'hui 也必蒙耶和华的恩惠
'ye'bi'qu'ni'men'zui'hao'de'tian'di 也必取你们最好的田地
'ye'bi'shi'ni'chi'de'bao'zu 也必使你吃得饱足
'ye'bi'shi'ni'xin'li'xi'le 也必使你心里喜乐
'ye'bi'si'xiang'ye'he'hua'de'ci'ai 也必思想耶和华的慈爱
'ye'bi'ting'ta'men'de'hu'qiu 也必听他们的呼求
'ye'bi'xiang'shi'zi'he'xiong'yi'ban 也必象狮子和熊一般
'ye'bi'xu'wang'luo'ma'qu'kan'kan 也必须往罗马去看看
'ye'bi'yong'yuan'yu'wo'men'tong'zai 也必永远与我们同在
'ye'bi'you'ling'xing'de'shen'ti 也必有灵性的身体
'ye'bi'yu'ni'men'bu'jie'jing 也必与你们不洁净
'ye'bi'yu'ni'men'de'zi'sun'zheng'bian 也必与你们的子孙争辩
'ye'bi'zai'he'chu'tian'ni'de'xue 也必在何处餂你的血
'ye'bi'zai'jian'xuan'ye'lu'sa'leng 也必再拣选耶路撒冷
'ye'bi'zhao'yang'chi'shen'er'qu 也必照样赤身而去
'ye'bi'zhao'yang'xing'fa'ni'men 也必照样刑罚你们
'ye'bi'zhao'yang'yu'ni'tong'zai 也必照样与你同在
'ye'bi'zhao'zhe'xie'zai'lv'fa'shu'shang 也必照着写在律法书上
'ye'bi'zhe'yang'qie'kai'ta'de'niu 也必这样切开他的牛
'ye'bin'wang'you'tie'che'jiu'bai'liang 耶宾王有铁车九百辆
'ye'bu'ba'zhe'shi'fang'zai'xin'shang 也不把这事放在心上
'ye'bu'bi'cong'shu'lin'fa'mu 也不必从树林伐木
'ye'bu'chi'diao'sang'de'shi'wu 也不吃吊丧的食物
'ye'bu'chi'fan'ye'bu'he'shui 也不吃饭也不喝水
'ye'bu'cong'ni'quan'nei'qu'shan'yang 也不从你圈内取山羊
'ye'bu'da'dun'ye'bu'shui'jiao 也不打盹也不睡觉
'ye'bu'dan'ti'zhe'yi'guo'si 也不但替这一国死
'ye'bu'de'chang'jiu'de'nian'ri 也不得长久的年日
'ye'bu'de'cong'shui'zhong'huan'xing 也不得从睡中唤醒
'ye'bu'de'cun'liu'gui'hui'you'da'di 也不得存留归回犹大地
'ye'bu'de'yong'qi'zhong'de'guo'zi 也不得用其中的果子
'ye'bu'de'zai'jian'ta'de'ben'guo 也不得再见他的本国
'ye'bu'deng'hou'shi'ren'zhi'gong 也不等候世人之功
'ye'bu'gai'bian'wo'kou'zhong'suo'chu'de 也不改变我口中所出的
'ye'bu'gu'fu'nv'suo'xian'mu'de'shen 也不顾妇女所羡慕的神
'ye'bu'gu'nian'cong'gu'ding'zhe'shi'de 也不顾念从古定这事的
'ye'bu'jian'zao'chen'de'guang'xian 也不见早晨的光线
'ye'bu'jiang'shu'jian'cha'ru'yun'zhong 也不将树尖插入云中
'ye'bu'jiao'ni'de'sheng'zhe'jian'xiu'huai 也不叫你的圣者见朽坏
'ye'bu'jiao'ta'men'de'sheng'chu'jian'shao 也不叫他们的牲畜减少
'ye'bu'jiao'wo'chi'ta'men'de'mei'shi 也不叫我吃他们的美食
'ye'bu'jiao'wo'men'de'jiao'yao'dong 也不叫我们的脚摇动
'ye'bu'jiao'wo'yin'shi'wang'er'hai'xiu 也不叫我因失望而害羞
'ye'bu'jin'ru'yi'se'lie'di 也不进入以色列地
'ye'bu'jin'shou'zun'xing'wo'de'dian'zhang 也不谨守遵行我的典章
'ye'bu'jing'bai'ni'suo'li'de'jin'xiang 也不敬拜你所立的金象
'ye'bu'jing'bai'wo'suo'li'de'jin'xiang 也不敬拜我所立的金象
'ye'bu'ke'chi'diao'sang'de'shi'wu 也不可吃吊丧的食物
'ye'bu'ke'chong'kan'you'shi'li'de'ren 也不可重看有势力的人
'ye'bu'ke'cong'ni'kou'zhong'chuan'shuo 也不可从你口中传说
'ye'bu'ke'dang'bi'nv'dai'ta 也不可当婢女待他
'ye'bu'ke'fang'wen'ta'men'de 也不可访问他们的
'ye'bu'ke'gei'mo'gui'liu'di'bu 也不可给魔鬼留地步
'ye'bu'ke'jian'fa'jiao'de'wu 也不可见发酵的物
'ye'bu'ke'jiang'e'shang'ti'guang 也不可将额上剃光
'ye'bu'ke'mo'shan'de'bian'jie 也不可摸山的边界
'ye'bu'ke'qiang'duo'ta'de'wu 也不可抢夺他的物
'ye'bu'ke'qin'ru'gu'er'de'tian'di 也不可侵入孤儿的田地
'ye'bu'ke'rong'fa'liu'zhang'chang 也不可容发绺长长
'ye'bu'ke'ru'ye'he'hua'de'hui 也不可入耶和华的会
'ye'bu'ke'shi'bai'xing'hui'ai'ji'qu 也不可使百姓回埃及去
'ye'bu'ke'shi'qu'suo'yi'luo'de 也不可拾取所遗落的
'ye'bu'ke'shuo'huang'hua'di'dang'zhen'dao 也不可说谎话抵挡真道
'ye'bu'ke'tan'lian'ren'de'qi'zi 也不可贪恋人的妻子
'ye'bu'ke'tan'tu'ren'de'fang'wu 也不可贪图人的房屋
'ye'bu'ke'wei'fu'mu'zhan'ran'zi'ji 也不可为父母沾染自己
'ye'bu'ke'wei'zi'ji'duo'ji'jin'yin 也不可为自己多积金银
'ye'bu'ke'wei'zi'ji'she'li'zhu'xiang 也不可为自己设立柱象
'ye'bu'ke'wei'zi'ji'zhu'zao'shen'xiang 也不可为自己铸造神象
'ye'bu'ke'wu'dai'wo'de'xian'zhi 也不可恶待我的先知
'ye'bu'ke'xi'ai'qi'jia'shi 也不可喜爱起假誓
'ye'bu'ke'xiao'fa'ta'men'de'xing'wei 也不可效法他们的行为
'ye'bu'ke'xiu'li'pu'tao'yuan 也不可修理葡萄园
'ye'bu'ke'xuan'ze'ta'suo'xing'de'lu 也不可选择他所行的路
'ye'bu'ke'yan'fan'ta'de'ze'bei 也不可厌烦他的责备
'ye'bu'ke'yin'shu'jia'da'jiu'pian'xing 也不可因赎价大就偏行
'ye'bu'ke'yong'zui'qi'pian'ren 也不可用嘴欺骗人
'ye'bu'ke'yu'lin'she'wei'di 也不可与邻舍为敌
'ye'bu'ke'yu'ta'men'zheng'zhan 也不可与他们争战
'ye'bu'ke'zai'ping'yuan'zhan'zhu 也不可在平原站住
'ye'bu'ke'zai'shen'shang'ci'hua'wen 也不可在身上刺花纹
'ye'bu'ke'zhao'ta'men'de'e'su'xing 也不可照他们的恶俗行
'ye'bu'ke'zhi'zhao'di'qi'shi 也不可指着地起誓
'ye'bu'ke'zuo'shen'me'xing'xiang 也不可做甚么形象
'ye'bu'li'qi'ta'de'chan'ye 也不离弃他的产业
'ye'bu'liu'xin'ta'shou'suo'zuo'de 也不留心他手所做的
'ye'bu'ming'bai'ni'shuo'de'shi'shen'me 也不明白你说的是甚么
'ye'bu'ming'bai'ta'de'chou'hua 也不明白他的筹划
'ye'bu'neng'ba'jiang'jie'gao'su'wang 也不能把讲解告诉王
'ye'bu'neng'jiu'ren'tuo'li'huan'nan 也不能救人脱离患难
'ye'bu'neng'shi'du'fu'bao'man 也不能使肚腹饱满
'ye'bu'neng'ti'ta'jiang'shu'jia'gei 也不能替他将赎价给
'ye'bu'neng'zuo'wo'de'men'tu 也不能作我的门徒
'ye'bu'pa'hei'ye'xing'de'wen'yi 也不怕黑夜行的瘟疫
'ye'bu'pei'zuo'wo'de'men'tu 也不配作我的门徒
'ye'bu'qu'shi'tou'wei'gen'ji'shi 也不取石头为根基石
'ye'bu'ren'shi'zi'ji'de'er'nv 也不认识自己的儿女
'ye'bu'rong'wo'de'yan'mu'da'dun 也不容我的眼目打盹
'ye'bu'rong'yi'se'lie'ren'qu 也不容以色列人去
'ye'bu'ru'yue'zhong'de'shu'mu 也不入月中的数目
'ye'bu'shi'cong'ji'li'li'zhai'pu'tao 也不是从蒺蔾里摘葡萄
'ye'bu'shi'cong'ren'yi'sheng'de 也不是从人意生的
'ye'bu'shi'duo'ci'jiang'zi'ji'xian'shang 也不是多次将自己献上
'ye'bu'shi'ren'da'bai'zhang'de'sheng'yin 也不是人打败仗的声音
'ye'bu'shi'ren'jiao'dao'wo'de 也不是人教导我的
'ye'bu'shi'shu'hu'zhe'shi'jie'de 也不是属乎这世界的
'ye'bu'shi'ta'fu'mu'fan'le'zui 也不是他父母犯了罪
'ye'bu'shi'wei'na'shou'ren'kui'fu'de 也不是为那受人亏负的
'ye'bu'shi'wei'wo'de'zui'qian 也不是为我的罪愆
'ye'bu'shi'wei'xian'bie'de'ji 也不是为献别的祭
'ye'bu'shi'wo'xin'suo'qi'de'yi 也不是我心所起的意
'ye'bu'shi'xian'zhi'de'men'tu 也不是先知的门徒
'ye'bu'shi'yin'da'zhang'si'wang 也不是因打仗死亡
'ye'bu'shi'yin'ni'xin'li'zheng'zhi 也不是因你心里正直
'ye'bu'shi'zhe'ren'fan'le'zui 也不是这人犯了罪
'ye'bu'shi'zhe'shi'shang'you'quan'you'wei 也不是这世上有权有位
'ye'bu'si'jiu'shi'ye'lu'sa'leng 耶布斯就是耶路撒冷
'ye'bu'si'ren'dou'mie'jue'jing'jin 耶布斯人都灭绝净尽
'ye'bu'si'ren'dou'yu'ni'men'zheng'zhan 耶布斯人都与你们争战
'ye'bu'si'ren'dui'da'wei'shuo 耶布斯人对大卫说
'ye'bu'si'xiang'zhe'shi'de'jie'ju 也不思想这事的结局
'ye'bu'sui'cong'shi'feng'bie'shen 也不随从事奉别神
'ye'bu'sui'huo'hui'bang'lin'li 也不随伙毁谤邻里
'ye'bu'ting'cong'ta'de'xun'hui 也不听从他的训诲
'ye'bu'ting'cong'wo'shi'fu'de'hua 也不听从我师傅的话
'ye'bu'xi'yue'ni'men'de'yan'su'hui 也不喜悦你们的严肃会
'ye'bu'xiao'de'shen'de'da'neng 也不晓得神的大能
'ye'bu'xin'tou'yi'ge'shen'ji 也不信头一个神迹
'ye'bu'xiu'li'dian'de'po'huai'zhi'chu 也不修理殿的破坏之处
'ye'bu'xu'ta'xia'guan'nan'ren 也不许他辖管男人
'ye'bu'yao'bei'ta'yan'pi'gou'yin 也不要被他眼皮勾引
'ye'bu'yao'chu'kuang'wang'de'yan'yu 也不要出狂妄的言语
'ye'bu'yao'chuan'liang'jian'gua'zi 也不要穿两件挂子
'ye'bu'yao'dai'liang'jian'gua'zi 也不要带两件褂子
'ye'bu'yao'dai'xie'he'guai'zhang 也不要带鞋和拐杖
'ye'bu'yao'guo'yu'zi'cheng'zhi'hui 也不要过于自逞智慧
'ye'bu'yao'hui'qu'qu'yi'shang 也不要回去取衣裳
'ye'bu'yao'jin'zhi'shuo'fang'yan 也不要禁止说方言
'ye'bu'yao'pa'na'di'de'ju'min 也不要怕那地的居民
'ye'bu'yao'pa'ta'men'de'hua 也不要怕他们的话
'ye'bu'yao'qi'yi'yu'ta'men'xiang'chu 也不要起意与他们相处
'ye'bu'yao'shou'shi'zun'de'cheng'hu 也不要受师尊的称呼
'ye'bu'yao'si'xiang'gu'shi'de'shi 也不要思想古时的事
'ye'bu'yao'tan'ta'de'mei'wei 也不要贪他的美味
'ye'bu'yao'wei'ta'men'bei'shang 也不要为他们悲伤
'ye'bu'yao'wei'ta'men'zhu'fu 也不要为他们祝福
'ye'bu'yao'wei'tian'xiang'jing'huang 也不要为天象惊惶
'ye'bu'yao'xiang'wo'wei'ta'men'qi'qiu 也不要向我为他们祈求
'ye'bu'yao'yi'kao'wu'ding'de'qian'cai 也不要倚靠无定的钱财
'ye'bu'yao'yin'qiang'duo'er'jiao'ao 也不要因抢夺而骄傲
'ye'bu'yao'yin'ren'de'hui'bang'jing'huang 也不要因人的毁谤惊惶
'ye'bu'yao'yin'ta'men'jing'kong 也不要因他们惊恐
'ye'bu'yao'yong'yuan'ji'nian'zui'nie 也不要永远纪念罪孽
'ye'bu'yao'zai'lie'nu'zhong'cheng'fa'wo 也不要在烈怒中惩罚我
'ye'bu'yin'de'li'yi'zhi'zu 也不因得利益知足
'ye'bu'yin'ta'men'de'xuan'hua'suo'fu 也不因他们的喧哗缩伏
'ye'bu'yong'da'li'he'duo'min 也不用大力和多民
'ye'bu'yong'lai'zhe'me'yuan'da'shui 也不用来这么远打水
'ye'bu'yong'shi'li'zhong'ya'ni 也不用势力重压你
'ye'bu'yu'man'hong'ren'de'tong'qun 也不与瞒哄人的同群
'ye'bu'zai'feng'ta'de'ming'jiang'lun 也不再奉他的名讲论
'ye'bu'zai'hu'na'ben'pao'de 也不在乎那奔跑的
'ye'bu'zai'hui'mie'yi'fa'lian 也不再毁灭以法莲
'ye'bu'zai'jiao'wo'kan'jian'zhe'da'huo 也不再叫我看见这大火
'ye'bu'zai'shi'di'tu'bu'sheng'chan 也不再使地土不生产
'ye'bu'zai'shi'guo'min'ban'die 也不再使国民绊跌
'ye'bu'zai'shi'guo'min'sang'zi 也不再使国民丧子
'ye'bu'zai'shou'wai'bang'ren'de'xiu'ru 也不再受外邦人的羞辱
'ye'bu'zai'xing'zhan'bu'de'shi 也不再行占卜的事
'ye'bu'zai'you'hong'shui'hui'huai'di'le 也不再有洪水毁坏地了
'ye'bu'zai'zhe'di'fang'chi'fan'he'shui 也不在这地方吃饭喝水
'ye'bu'zai'zhuan'qu'bu'gen'cong'wo 也不再转去不跟从我
'ye'bu'zai'zi'gao'yu'lie'guo'zhi'shang 也不再自高于列国之上
'ye'bu'zhao'zhe'ye'lu'ba'li 也不照着耶路巴力
'ye'bu'zhi'dao'wang'na'li'qu 也不知道往那里去
'ye'bu'zhu'yi'ye'he'hua'de'wei'yan 也不注意耶和华的威严
'ye'bu'zhuan'li'ta'men'de'e'xing 也不转离他们的恶行
'ye'bu'zun'jing'lao'ren'de'mian 也不尊敬老人的面
'ye'bu'zun'xing'ni'de'lv'fa 也不遵行你的律法
'ye'bu'zun'xing'wo'de'lv'li 也不遵行我的律例
'ye'ceng'ji'zhe'ta'chuang'zao'zhu'shi'jie 也曾藉着他创造诸世界
'ye'cheng'xin'ye'su'de'ren'wei'yi 也称信耶稣的人为义
'ye'cong'wo'yan'qian'yin'cang'le 也从我眼前隐藏了
'ye'da'ya'shi'shen'li'de'er'zi 耶大雅是申利的儿子
'ye'da'ya'zu'you'na'tan'ye 耶大雅族有拿坦业
'ye'dai'zhe'ni'men'de'xiong'di 也带着你们的兄弟
'ye'dang'ce'er'ting'wo'de'hua 也当侧耳听我的话
'ye'dang'hang'zai'ni'zi'ji'jia'xiang'li 也当行在你自己家乡里
'ye'dang'jiao'ta'zhao'yang'tong'ku'bei'ai 也当叫他照样痛苦悲哀
'ye'dang'qi'lai'jian'zao'ye'he'hua 也当起来建造耶和华
'ye'dang'yin'wo'suo'zuo'de'shi'xin'wo 也当因我所做的事信我
'ye'dang'zai'na'li'fang'zhi'sheng'de'wu 也当在那里放至圣的物
'ye'dang'zhuo'qu'ba'ta'zhi'si 也当捉去把他治死
'ye'dei'bu'zhao'sheng'ming'de'lu 也得不着生命的路
'ye'di'de'shou'duo'qi'lai'hai'ni 野地的兽多起来害你
'ye'di'de'zou'shou'bi'zun'zhong'wo 野地的走兽必尊重我
'ye'di'de'zou'shou'na'ta'dang'shi'wu 野地的走兽拿他当食物
'ye'di'de'zou'shou'ye'dou'shu'wo 野地的走兽也都属我
'ye'di'hai'mei'you'cao'mu 野地还没有草木
'ye'di'li'de'cao'jin'tian'hai'zai 野地里的草今天还在
'ye'di'zou'shou'dou'qi'le'ming 野地走兽都起了名
'ye'die'de'er'zi'shi'bi'le'han 耶叠的儿子是比勒罕
'ye'dou'he'le'yi'yang'de'ling'shui 也都喝了一样的灵水
'ye'dou'jia'gong'sha'mie'ta'men 也都夹攻杀灭他们
'ye'dou'shuo'dao'zhe'xie'ri'zi 也都说到这些日子
'ye'dou'yi'tong'shou'le'ge'li 也都一同受了割礼
'ye'dou'zai'ta'mian'qian'guo'qu 也都在他面前过去
'ye'du'dun'de'er'zi'ji'da'li 耶杜顿的儿子基大利
'ye'du'dun'de'zi'sun'zuo'shou'men'de 耶杜顿的子孙作守门的
'ye'du'dun'tong'zhe'ta'men'chui'hao 耶杜顿同着他们吹号
'ye'feng'yan'le'wo'de'zui'nie 也缝严了我的罪孽
'ye'fu'ni'de'er'zi'shi'jia'le 耶孚尼的儿子是迦勒
'ye'fu'ta'dui'ji'lie'de'zhang'lao'shuo 耶弗他对基列的长老说
'ye'fu'ta'jiu'tao'bi'ta'de'di'xiong 耶弗他就逃避他的弟兄
'ye'fu'ta'jiu'xiang'ye'he'hua'xu'yuan 耶弗他就向耶和华许愿
'ye'fu'ta'shi'ji'lie'suo'sheng'de 耶弗他是基列所生的
'ye'gai'xiao'de'shen'de'guo'jin'le 也该晓得神的国近了
'ye'gai'zhi'dao'ren'zi'jin'le 也该知道人子近了
'ye'gao'su'ta'de'ge'ge'men'shuo 也告诉他的哥哥们说

'yi'fa'lian'shi'mei'you'fan'guo'de'bing 以法莲是没有翻过的饼

'yi'fa'lian'shi'xun'liang'de'mu'niu'du 以法莲是驯良的母牛犊

'yi'fa'lian'yin'le'cong'ren'de'ming'ling 以法莲因乐从人的命令
'yi'fa'lian'yin'wei'jia'li'zao'huo 以法莲因为家里遭祸

'you'an'da'wei'suo'ding'de'li 又按大卫所定的例
'you'an'zong'zu'jia'pu'fen'gei'ji'si 又按宗族家谱分给祭司
'you'ba'deng'tai'an'zai'hui'mu'nei 又把灯台安在会幕内
'you'ba'fa'ban'fang'zai'gui'li 又把法版放在柜里
'you'ba'fan'ji'yi'kuai'yi'kuai'de 又把燔祭一块一块的
'you'ba'gong'niu'he'shan'yang'xian'shang 又把公牛和山羊献上
'you'ba'huo'niao'fang'zai'tian'ye'li 又把活鸟放在田野里
'you'ba'liu'fu'man'zi'lian'cheng'yi'fu 又把六幅幔子连成一幅
'you'ba'mu'ou'he'diao'ke'de'xiang 又把木偶和雕刻的象
'you'ba'qi'zhong'de'qi'ju'he'tan 又把其中的器具和坛
'you'ba'shi'ren'cong'shi'jian'he'shi'luo 有八十人从示剑和示罗
'you'ba'ta'men'yi'qie'huo'cai 又把他们一切货财
'you'ba'wo'de'nv'er'men'dai'le'qu 又把我的女儿们带了去
'you'ba'wo'men'xia'zai'jian'li 又把我们下在监里
'you'ba'xue'dao'zai'tan'jiao'na'li 又把血倒在坛脚那里
'you'ba'xue'sa'zai'tan'de'zhou'wei 又把血洒在坛的周围
'you'ba'zhuo'zi'an'zai'hui'mu'nei 又把桌子安在会幕内
'you'ban'dian'de'ma'wang'nan'fang'qu 有斑点的马往南方去
'you'bang'zai'tou'shang'wei'guan'mian 又绑在头上为冠冕
'you'bao'feng'zai'ta'si'wei'da'gua 有暴风在他四围大刮
'you'bao'gei'ni'men'de'xin'xi 又报给你们的信息
'you'bao'quan'ta'yi'shen'de'gu'tou 又保全他一身的骨头
'you'bao'xin'de'lai'jian'yue'bo 有报信的来见约伯
'you'bei'lu'dao'ba'bi'lun'qu'de 有被掳到巴比伦去的
'you'bei'tie'lian'he'jiao'liao'kun'suo 又被铁链和脚镣捆锁
'you'bi'chu'diao'ni'shou'zhong'de'xie'shu 又必除掉你手中的邪术
'you'bi'da'xu'de'er'zi'jia'ma'lie 有比大蓿的儿子迦玛列
'you'bi'er'de'er'zi'bi'la 有比珥的儿子比拉
'you'bi'jia'hai'zai'ta'men'shen'shang 又必加害在他们身上
'you'bi'jiao'nong'fu'lai'ku'hao 又必叫农夫来哭号
'you'bi'jin'ru'na'rong'mei'zhi'di 又必进入那荣美之地
'you'bi'qu'ni'men'de'pu'ren'bi'nv 又必取你们的仆人婢女
'you'bi'shi'dao'jian'zhui'sha'ta'men 又必使刀剑追杀他们
'you'bi'shi'feng'ni'de'xiong'di 又必事奉你的兄弟
'you'bi'zai'guo'zhong'zhe'duan'gong'dao 又必在国中折断弓刀
'you'bi'zai'wei'shang'zuo'ji'si 又必在位上作祭司
'you'bian'da'fan'suo'shou'na'de'er'zi 又鞭打凡所收纳的儿子
'you'bian'de'qi'ming'jiao'ya'jin 右边的起名叫雅斤
'you'biao'ming'wo'men'le'yi'de'xin 又表明我们乐意的心
'you'bie'ren'zai'shang'mian'jian'zao 有别人在上面建造

'you'bo'shan'he'shu'bo'shan'de'zhen'shi 有伯善和属伯善的镇市

'you'bu'hui'gai'ta'men'na'xie'xiong'sha 又不悔改他们那些凶杀
'you'bu'jiang'zhe'shi'fang'zai'xin'shang 又不将这事放在心上
'you'bu'ke'zhi'zhe'ni'de'tou'qi'shi 又不可指着你的头起誓
'you'bu'neng'yu'bei'de'jiu'fen'gei'ta 有不能预备的就分给他
'you'bu'shi'ni'de'jing'huang'wei'he'wo 又不使你的惊惶威吓我
'you'bu'shun'ta'de'yi'si'xing 又不顺他的意思行
'you'cha'na'wei'xiong'di'yu'ta'tong'qu 又差那位兄弟与他同去
'you'chai'hui'cheng'men'pang'de'qiu'tan 又拆毁城门旁的邱坛

'you'cong'si'wei'ju'ji'ta'men 又从四围聚集他们

'you'gong'yi'de'guan'mian'wei'wo'cun'liu 有公义的冠冕为我存留
'you'gu'juan'mei'you'han'jiao'er'zi 有古卷没有喊叫二字
'you'gu'juan'shi'cong'qing'jie'de'xin 有古卷是从清洁的心
'you'gu'juan'wu'yi'sai'ya'san'ge'zi 有古卷无以赛亚叁个字
'you'gu'juan'zai'fan'zi'xia'jia 有古卷在凡字下加
'you'gua'shang'zhang'mu'de'men'lian 又挂上帐幕的门帘
'you'guai'bing'tie'zai'ta'shen'shang 有怪病贴在他身上
'you'guan'li'ge'yang'de'sheng'dou'chi'du 又管理各样的升斗尺度
'you'gui'xia'da'sheng'han'zhe'shuo 又跪下大声喊着说
'you'ha'sha'bi'ya'de'zeng'sun 有哈沙比雅的曾孙
'you'hao'xiang'luo'de'de'ri'zi 又好象罗得的日子
'you'hao'xiao'xi'cong'yuan'fang'lai 有好消息从远方来
'you'hao'xie'fu'nv'zai'na'li 有好些妇女在那里
'you'hao'xie'ren'ti'bi'zuo'shu 有好些人提笔作书

'you'ren'yi'shou'ge'li'meng'zhao'ne 有人已受割礼蒙召呢
'you'ren'yi'wei'ta'shi'dan'yan 有人以为他是耽延
'you'ren'yin'you'da'dai'zhe'qian'nang 有人因犹大带着钱囊

'yu'shi'wang'wei'ta'pai'yi'ge'tai'jian 于是王为他派一个太监
'yu'shi'wang'xi'huan'chai'qian'wo'qu 于是王喜欢差遣我去
'yu'shi'wang'yao'xiang'na'you'bian'de'shuo 于是王要向那右边的说
'yu'shi'wang'zhan'zai'cheng'men'pang 于是王站在城门旁
'yu'shi'wen'ta'xu'duo'de'hua 于是问他许多的话
'yu'shi'wo'cha'qian'ren'qu'jian'ta'men 于是我差遣人去见他们
'yu'shi'wo'men'guo'le'sa'lie'xi 于是我们过了撒烈溪
'yu'shi'wo'mo'dao'tian'shang'de 于是我默祷天上的
'yu'shi'wo'qi'lai'wang'ping'yuan'qu 于是我起来往平原去
'yu'shi'wo'zun'ming'shuo'yu'yan 于是我遵命说预言
'yu'shi'wu'ge'ya'mo'li'wang 于是五个亚摩利王
'yu'shi'xi'luo'di'huai'hen'ta 于是希罗底怀恨他
'yu'shi'xi'mian'yu'ta'tong'qu 于是西缅与他同去
'yu'shi'xia'shou'na'zhu'ta'men 于是下手拿住他们
'yu'shi'xian'zhi'ye'li'mi'jiu'zou'le 于是先知耶利米就走了
'yu'shi'xie'xin'jiao'fu'ta'men 于是写信交付他们
'yu'shi'ya'bi'ren'dui'ya'men'ren'shuo 于是雅比人对亚扪人说
'yu'shi'ya'bo'la'han'sheng'le'yi'sa 于是亚伯拉罕生了以撒
'yu'shi'ya'ge'ji'qi'fa'da 于是雅各极其发大
'yu'shi'ya'ge'xia'le'ai'ji 于是雅各下了埃及
'yu'shi'ya'sa'chu'qu'yu'ta'ying'di 于是亚撒出去与他迎敌

'yu'shi'ye'li'mi'dui'ta'shuo 于是耶利米对他说
'yu'shi'ye'li'mi'zhu'zai'min'zhong 于是耶利米住在民中
'yu'shi'ye'su'dui'men'tu'shuo 于是耶稣对门徒说
'yu'shi'ye'su'kai'ta'men'de'xin'qiao 于是耶稣开他们的心窍
'yu'shi'yi'fa'lian'de'zhong'ren'ju'ji 于是以法莲的众人聚集
'yu'shi'yi'ge'xing'xiang'wo'xia'bai 与十一个星向我下拜
'yu'shi'yi'li'sha'yu'ta'men'tong'qu 于是以利沙与他们同去
'yu'shi'yi'sao'zhu'zai'xi'er'shan'li 于是以扫住在西珥山里
'yu'shi'yi'se'lie'ren'ji'sha'ta'men 于是以色列人击杀他们
'yu'shi'yi'se'lie'ren'zhe'yang'xing'le 于是以色列人这样行了

'yu'shi'yi'se'lie'wang'zhao'ju'xian'zhi 于是以色列王招聚先知
'yu'shi'yong'liang'zhi'shou'an'zhe'ta 于是用两只手按着他
'yu'shi'you'er'wan'er'qian'ren'hui'qu 于是有二万二千人回去
'yu'shi'you'fu'shi'le'la'ban'qi'nian 于是又服事了拉班七年

'yu'wan'de'xian'zhi'you'huo'le 愚顽的先知有祸了

'yue'se'de'zi'sun'dui'yue'shu'ya'shuo 约瑟的子孙对约书亚说
'yue'se'dui'fa'lao'jia'zhong'de'ren'shuo 约瑟对法老家中的人说
'yue'se'dui'ta'di'xiong'men'shuo 约瑟对他弟兄们说
'yue'se'huo'le'yi'bai'yi'shi'sui 约瑟活了一百一十岁
'yue'se'ji'xu'wu'gu'shen'duo 约瑟积蓄五榖甚多
'yue'se'jin'dao'ta'men'na'li 约瑟进到他们那里
'yue'se'jin'qu'gao'su'fa'lao'shuo 约瑟进去告诉法老说
'yue'se'jin'wu'li'qu'ban'shi 约瑟进屋里去办事
'yue'se'jiu'chu'qu'xun'xing'ai'ji'di 约瑟就出去巡行埃及地
'yue'se'jiu'qu'zhui'gan'ta'ge'ge'men 约瑟就去追赶他哥哥们
'yue'se'jiu'xiang'ta'qi'le'shi 约瑟就向他起了誓
'yue'se'jiu'zai'zhu'ren'yan'qian'meng'en 约瑟就在主人眼前蒙恩
'yue'se'kai'le'ge'chu'de'cang 约瑟开了各处的仓
'yue'se'kan'jian'ta'ge'ge'men 约瑟看见他哥哥们
'yue'se'ling'ta'men'dao'ta'gen'qian 约瑟领他们到他跟前
'yue'se'ren'de'ta'ge'ge'men 约瑟认得他哥哥们
'yue'se'shi'duo'jie'guo'zi'de'shu'zhi 约瑟是多结果子的树枝
'yue'se'shi'ma'ta'ti'ya'de'er'zi 约瑟是玛他提亚的儿子
'yue'se'shi'xi'li'de'er'zi 约瑟是希里的儿子
'yue'se'shi'you'da'de'er'zi 约瑟是犹大的儿子
'yue'se'shi'yue'nan'de'er'zi 约瑟是约南的儿子
'yue'se'tao'che'wang'ge'shan'qu 约瑟套车往歌珊去
'yue'se'you'dui'ta'di'xiong'men'shuo 约瑟又对他弟兄们说
'yue'se'you'la'zhe'ta'men'liang'ge 约瑟又拉着他们两个
'yue'se'yuan'lai'xiu'ya'jun'mei 约瑟原来秀雅俊美
'yue'se'zang'le'ta'fu'qin'yi'hou 约瑟葬了他父亲以后
'yue'se'zhi'pai'de'ren'shuo'de'you'li 约瑟支派的人说得有理
'yue'se'zhi'pai'zhong'you'yi'wan'er'qian 约瑟支派中有一万二千
'yue'se'zun'zhao'fa'lao'de'ming 约瑟遵着法老的命
'yue'sha'fa'cong'li'wei'ren'he'ji'si 约沙法从利未人和祭司
'yue'sha'fa'da'you'zun'rong'zi'cai 约沙法大有尊荣赀财
'yue'sha'fa'de'er'zi'shi'yue'lan 约沙法的儿子是约兰
'yue'sha'fa'de'er'zi'ye'hu 约沙法的儿子耶户
'yue'sha'fa'de'guo'de'xiang'tai'ping 约沙法的国得享太平
'yue'sha'fa'dui'yi'se'lie'wang'shuo 约沙法对以色列王说
'yue'sha'fa'ji'yu'min'shang'yi'le 约沙法既与民商议了
'yue'sha'fa'jiu'mian'fu'yu'di 约沙法就面伏于地
'yue'sha'fa'yu'lie'zu'tong'shui 约沙法与列祖同睡
'yue'sha'fa'yu'ta'lie'zu'tong'shui 约沙法与他列祖同睡
'yue'sha'fa'yu'yi'se'lie'wang'he'hao 约沙法与以色列王和好
'yue'sha'fa'zhi'zao'ta'shi'chuan'zhi 约沙法制造他施船只
'yue'sha'fa'zhu'fu'ta'men'shuo 约沙法嘱咐他们说
'yue'sha'fa'zhu'zai'ye'lu'sa'leng 约沙法住在耶路撒冷
'yue'shan'de'er'zi'shi'shi'ba 约珊的儿子是示巴
'yue'shan'sheng'le'shi'ba'he'di'dan 约珊生了示巴和底但
'yue'shi'ba'shi'yue'lan'wang'de'nv'er 约示巴是约兰王的女儿
'yue'shi'bi'de'er'zi'ye'hu 约示比的儿子耶户
'yue'shi'bi'shi'xi'lai'ya'de'er'zi 约示比是西莱雅的儿子
'yue'shu'ya'bi'yin'dao'ni'men'guo'qu 约书亚必引导你们过去
'yue'shu'ya'bian'si'lie'yi'fu 约书亚便撕裂衣服
'yue'shu'ya'da'fa'ta'men'qian'wang 约书亚打发他们前往
'yue'shu'ya'de'sheng'ming'chuan'yang'bian'di 约书亚的声名传扬遍地
'yue'shu'ya'dui'bai'xing'shuo'wan'le'hua 约书亚对百姓说完了话
'yue'shu'ya'dui'yi'se'lie'ren'shuo 约书亚对以色列人说
'yue'shu'ya'duo'le'ma'ji'da 约书亚夺了玛基大
'yue'shu'ya'duo'le'na'quan'di 约书亚夺了那全地
'yue'shu'ya'fen'fu'bai'xing'shuo 约书亚吩咐百姓说
'yue'shu'ya'ji'sha'quan'di'de'ren 约书亚击杀全地的人
'yue'shu'ya'jiang'ai'cheng'fen'shao 约书亚将艾城焚烧
'yue'shu'ya'jiang'lv'fa'shang'zhu'fu 约书亚将律法上祝福
'yue'shu'ya'jiang'zhe'xie'hua'dou'xie'zai 约书亚将这些话都写在
'yue'shu'ya'jiao'zhong'ren'qi'shi'shuo 约书亚叫众人起誓说
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'dao'gao'ye'he'hua 约书亚就祷告耶和华
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'fen'fu'ji'si'shuo 约书亚就吩咐祭司说
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'fu'fu'zai'di'xia'bai 约书亚就俯伏在地下拜
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'li'zai'ji'jia 约书亚就立在吉甲
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'yu'bai'xing'li'yue 约书亚就与百姓立约
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'zhao'zhe'xing'le 约书亚就照着行了
'yue'shu'ya'jiu'zhi'zao'le'huo'shi'dao 约书亚就制造了火石刀
'yue'shu'ya'xing'ge'li'de'yuan'gu 约书亚行割礼的缘故
'yue'shu'ya'you'fen'fu'ji'si'shuo 约书亚又吩咐祭司说
'yue'shu'ya'you'yong'huo'fen'shao'xia'suo 约书亚又用火焚烧夏琐
'yue'shu'ya'zai'yue'dan'he'xi 约书亚在约但河西
'yue'shu'ya'zhao'le'liu'bian'ren 约书亚召了流便人
'yue'shu'ya'zhao'le'ta'men'lai 约书亚召了他们来
'yue'shu'ya'zhe'cai'gei'ta'men'xing'le 约书亚这才给他们行了
'yue'shu'ya'zhi'jiang'xia'suo'fen'shao'le 约书亚只将夏琐焚烧了
'yue'shu'ya'zhu'fu'ta'men'shuo 约书亚嘱咐他们说
'yue'shu'ya'zhuan'hui'duo'le'xia'suo 约书亚转回夺了夏琐
'yue'tan'de'er'zi'shi'ya'ha'si 约坦的儿子是亚哈斯
'yue'tan'yu'ta'lie'zu'tong'shui 约坦与他列祖同睡
'yue'xi'shi'yi'li'yi'xie'de'er'zi 约细是以利以谢的儿子
'yue'xi'ya'chu'qu'di'dang'ta 约西亚出去抵挡他
'yue'xi'ya'de'zhang'zi'shi'yue'ha'nan 约西亚的长子是约哈难
'yue'xi'ya'wang'qu'di'dang'ta 约西亚王去抵挡他
'yue'xi'ya'wang'zai'wei'de'shi'hou 约西亚王在位的时候
'yue'xi'ya'zai'shi'de'ri'zi 约西亚在世的日子
'yue'ya'cong'da'wei'na'li'chu'lai 约押从大卫那里出来
'yue'ya'da'fa'shi'zhe'qu'jian'da'wei 约押打发使者去见大卫
'yue'ya'da'fa'wang'de'pu'ren 约押打发王的仆人
'yue'ya'de'er'zi'shi'yi'duo 约亚的儿子是易多
'yue'ya'de'ren'he'ji'li'ti'ren 约押的人和基利提人
'yue'ya'dui'bao'xin'de'ren'shuo 约押对报信的人说
'yue'ya'dui'la'bo'sha'ji'shuo 约亚对拉伯沙基说
'yue'ya'jin'sheng'yi'li'ya'shi 约雅金生以利亚实
'yue'ya'jing'fu'shi'ta'san'nian 约雅敬服事他叁年
'yue'ya'jing'jiang'jin'yin'gei'fa'lao 约雅敬将金银给法老
'yue'ya'jing'shi'xi'di'jia'de'bie'ming 约雅敬是西底家的别名
'yue'ya'jing'wang'he'ta'zhong'yong'shi 约雅敬王和他众勇士
'yue'ya'jing'yu'ta'lie'zu'tong'shui 约雅敬与他列祖同睡
'yue'ya'jiu'hui'ye'lu'sa'leng'qu'le 约押就回耶路撒冷去了
'yue'ya'jiu'li'kai'ya'men'ren'na'li 约押就离开亚扪人那里
'yue'ya'jiu'mian'fu'yu'di'kou'bai 约押就面伏于地叩拜
'yue'ya'li'zu'you'ma'te'nai 约雅立族有玛特乃
'yue'ya'ling'ta'dao'cheng'men'de'weng'dong 约押领他到城门的瓮洞
'yue'ya'na'shi'li'sa'de'er'zi 约亚拿是利撒的儿子
'yue'ya'shou'na'san'gan'duan'qiang 约押手拿叁杆短枪
'yue'ya'tao'dao'ye'he'hua'de'zhang'mu 约押逃到耶和华的帐幕
'yue'ya'ting'jian'jiao'sheng'jiu'shuo 约押听见角声就说
'yue'ya'xiong'di'ya'bi'shai'shou'xia 约押兄弟亚比筛手下
'yue'ya'yong'dao'ci'ru'ta'de'du'fu 约押用刀刺入他的肚腹
'yue'ya'zhui'gan'ya'ni'er'hui'lai 约押追赶押尼珥回来
'yue'ya'zuo'shou'shi'qi'dao'lai 约押左手拾起刀来
'yue'ye'shi'pi'da'ya'de'er'zi 约叶是毘大雅的儿子
'yue'you'an'xi'ri'ke'zou'de'lu'cheng 约有安息日可走的路程
'yue'you'si'wan'ren'dou'zhun'bei'da'zhang 约有四万人都准备打仗
'yue'zai'wu'zheng'he'shen'chu'you'chu'qu 约在午正和申初又出去
'yue'zai'xian'wan'ji'de'shi'hou 约在献晚祭的时候
'yue'zai'you'chu'gu'de'ren'lai'le 约在酉初雇的人来了
'yun'cai'cong'hui'mu'shang'nuo'kai'le 云彩从会幕上挪开了
'yun'cai'ji'shi'cong'zhang'mu'shou'shang'qu 云彩几时从帐幕收上去
'yun'cai'ru'he'fu'yu'kong'zhong 云彩如何浮于空中
'yun'cai'ting'liu'zai'zhang'mu'shang 云彩停留在帐幕上
'yun'cai'ting'zhu'zai'ba'lan'de'kuang'ye 云彩停住在巴兰的旷野
'yun'cai'wei'ta'jiao'xia'de'chen'tu 云彩为他脚下的尘土
'yun'cai'zai'zhang'mu'shang'ting'zhu'ji'shi 云彩在帐幕上停住几时
'yun'dao'suo'luo'men'wang'na'li 运到所罗门王那里
'yun'shang'zuo'zhe'yi'wei'hao'xiang'ren'zi 云上坐着一位好象人子
'yun'zhong'hong'de'xing'zhuang'zen'yang 云中虹的形状怎样
'yun'zhu'ting'zai'hui'mu'men'yi'shang 云柱停在会幕门以上
'zai'ai'ji'di'ji'huang'shen'da 在埃及地饥荒甚大
'zai'ai'ji'di'xian'shen'ji'qi'shi 在埃及地显神迹奇事
'zai'ai'ji'ji'sha'yi'qie'zhang'zi 在埃及击杀一切长子
'zai'an'ti'a'de'jiao'hui'zhong 在安提阿的教会中
'zai'an'xi'ri'de'qian'yi'ri 在安息日的前一日
'zai'an'xi'ri'diao'zai'jing'li 在安息日掉在井里
'zai'an'xi'ri'jiao'xun'zhong'ren 在安息日教训众人
'zai'an'xi'ri'jin'hui'tang'zuo'xia 在安息日进会堂坐下
'zai'an'xi'ri'mai'gei'you'da'ren 在安息日卖给犹大人
'zai'an'xi'ri'xing'shan'xing'e 在安息日行善行恶
'zai'an'xi'ri'yi'zhi'bu'yi'zhi 在安息日医治不医治
'zai'an'xi'ri'zhi'bing'bu'zhi'bing 在安息日治病不治病
'zai'an'zhong'chan'bang'ta'lin'ju'de 在暗中谗谤他邻居的
'zai'ba'bi'lun'de'jie'shang'bei'ci'tou 在巴比伦的街上被刺透
'zai'ba'ge'zi'cong'fang'zhou'fang'chu'qu 再把鸽子从方舟放出去
'zai'ba'la'mian'qian'bei'dao'sha'bai 在巴拉面前被刀杀败
'zai'ba'lan'de'kuang'ye'an'ying 在巴兰的旷野安营
'zai'bai'xing'mian'qian'ji'sha'ta 在百姓面前击杀他
'zai'ben'guo'de'min'zhong'hang'bu'shan 在本国的民中行不善
'zai'ben'min'zhong'bi'wu'zi'wu'sun 在本民中必无子无孙
'zai'ben'zu'de'qi'hao'na'li 在本族的旗号那里
'zai'bian'di'shang'ye'bei'zun'chong 在遍地上也被尊崇
'zai'bian'ya'min'de'ji'bi'ya 在便雅悯的基比亚
'zai'bian'ya'min'jing'nei'de'xie'sa 在便雅悯境内的泄撒
'zai'bian'ya'min'zhi'pai'de'di'zhong 在便雅悯支派的地中
'zai'bing'ruo'zai'fang'zi'li'fa'san 灾病若在房子里发散
'zai'bing'ruo'zai'fang'zi'li'you'fa'xian 灾病若在房子里又发现
'zai'bing'zai'ta'shen'shang'de'ri'zi 灾病在他身上的日子
'zai'bo'ha'ji'lin'li'hao'qi 在伯哈基琳立号旗
'zai'bo'te'li'shang'tan'shao'xiang 在伯特利上坛烧香
'zai'bo'te'li'yu'jian'ye'he'hua 在伯特利遇见耶和华
'zai'bo'ya'wen'chui'chu'da'sheng 在伯亚文吹出大声
'zai'cao'cong'zhi'zhong'cai'xian'cao 在草丛之中采咸草
'zai'chen'tu'he'lu'hui'zhong'ao'hui 在尘土和炉灰中懊悔
'zai'chen'tu'zhong'shi'de'wen'nuan 在尘土中使得温暖
'zai'cheng'li'de'ying'dang'chu'lai 在城里的应当出来
'zai'cheng'men'kou'an'zhi'li'pan'duan 在城门口按至理判断
'zai'cheng'men'kou'bing'gong'xing'yi 在城门口秉公行义
'zai'cheng'men'kou'qu'wang'qiong'fa'ren 在城门口屈枉穷乏人
'zai'cheng'nei'ye'you'zui'nie'he'jian'e 在城内也有罪孽和奸恶
'zai'cheng'qiang'shang'guo'le'lu'lou 在城墙上过了炉楼
'zai'chou'di'mian'qian'bi'zhan'li'bu'zhu 在仇敌面前必站立不住
'zai'chou'di'mian'qian'shou'hui'you'shou 在仇敌面前收回右手
'zai'chou'mi'de'shu'lin'zhong'zhe'qi'lai 在稠密的树林中着起来
'zai'chu'ying'yi'shang'liang'chi'shan'zhan 在雏鹰以上两翅扇展
'zai'chuan'shang'chu'le'yi'ge'bing 在船上除了一个饼
'zai'chuan'shang'de'ren'dou'bai'ta 在船上的人都拜他
'zai'chuang'hu'nei'you'ming'jiao'de'sheng'yin 在窗户内有鸣叫的声音
'zai'ci'bing'bu'fen'xi'la'ren 在此并不分希腊人
'zai'ci'nai'shi'cheng'song'de'hua 在此乃是称颂的话
'zai'ci'shi'dei'en'ci'yi'bing'de 再次是得恩赐医病的
'zai'da'ma'feng'de'zai'bing'shang 在大麻疯的灾病上
'zai'da'ma'se'kan'jian'yi'zuo'tan 在大马色看见一座坛
'zai'da'ma'se'you'yi'ge'men'tu 在大马色有一个门徒
'zai'da'shui'zhong'jing'li'shi'wu'de 在大水中经理事务的

'zai'da'wei'zhang'mu'zhong'shi'xing'shen'pan 在大卫帐幕中施行审判

'zai'dao'gao'zhi'jian'chang'chang'ken'qiu 在祷告之间常常恳求
'zai'di'bo'la'de'zong'shu'xia 在底波拉的棕树下
'zai'di'de'shen'chu'bei'lian'luo 在地的深处被联络
'zai'di'ren'zhong'jian'xian'ta'de'shen'ji 在敌人中间显他的神迹
'zai'di'shang'da'da'de'wang'shang'chang 在地上大大地往上长
'zai'di'shang'gong'yi'bai'wu'shi'tian 在地上共一百五十天
'zai'di'shang'guo'you'shi'xing'pan'duan'de 在地上果有施行判断的
'zai'di'shang'shi'xing'gong'ping'he'gong'yi 在地上施行公平和公义
'zai'di'shang'wei'zi'ji'qiu'fu'de 在地上为自己求福的
'zai'di'xiong'zhong'zuo'da'ji'si 在弟兄中作大祭司
'zai'dian'li'dao'gao'de'shi'hou 在殿里祷告的时候
'zai'dian'qian'zao'le'liang'gen'zhu'zi 在殿前造了两根柱子
'zai'dian'wai'que'bu'neng'kan'jian 在殿外却不能看见
'zai'duo'guo'ren'de'yan'qian'xian'xian 在多国人的眼前显现
'zai'duo'min'de'cheng'nei'you'ren'ai'heng 在多民的城内有人唉哼
'zai'e'fei'le'cheng'shang'duo'you'jian'zao 在俄斐勒城上多有建造
'zai'e'shi'shang'yao'zuo'ying'hai 在恶事上要作婴孩
'zai'fa'lao'mian'qian'ti'shuo'wo 在法老面前题说我
'zai'fa'nu'de'ri'zi'de'tao'tuo 在发怒的日子得逃脱
'zai'fan'zui'zhi'ri'bu'neng'jiu'ta 在犯罪之日不能救他
'zai'fang'wu'men'kou'tan'lun'ni 在房屋门口谈论你
'zai'fang'zi'feng'suo'de'shi'hou 在房子封锁的时候
'zai'feng'de'chi'bang'shang'xian'xian 在风的翅膀上显现
'zai'gai'sa'li'ya'xia'le'chuan 在该撒利亚下了船
'zai'gai'sa'li'ya'you'yi'ge'ren 在该撒利亚有一个人
'zai'gan'zao'zhi'di'bei'ni'zhi'gao'zhe 在干燥之地悖逆至高者
'zai'gang'shang'xie'du'wo'de'zui'nie 在冈上亵渎我的罪孽
'zai'gao'ming'shi'shang'ye'bi'yong'cun 在高明事上也必永存
'zai'ge'hui'tang'li'jiao'xun'ren 在各会堂里教训人

'zhe'dou'shi'yue'tan'de'er'zi 这都是约坍的儿子
'zhe'dou'shi'zai'yue'sa'da'de'sun'zi 这都是在约撒达的孙子
'zhe'dou'shi'zhao'ren'suo'fen'fu 这都是照人所吩咐
'zhe'dou'shi'zhu'kan'bu'shang'de 这都是主看不上的
'zhe'dou'shi'zhu'rou'de'fang'zi 这都是煮肉的房子
'zhe'dou'shi'zuo'zu'zhang'de 这都是作族长的

'zhe'dou'xie'zai'wo'mian'qian 这都写在我面前
'zhe'dou'yao'xiang'zai'jin'cao'zhong 这都要镶在金槽中
'zhe'dou'yao'yong'jing'jin'zhi'zuo 这都要用精金制作
'zhe'dou'yao'yong'xi'mai'mian'zuo'cheng 这都要用细麦面做成
'zhe'dou'yao'zai'ni'men'de 这都要在你们的
'zhe'dou'yin'ni'de'nao'hen'he'fen'nu 这都因你的恼恨和忿怒
'zhe'dou'yin'qi'jian'ju'min'de'zui'e 这都因其间居民的罪恶
'zhe'dou'yin'ya'ge'de'zui'guo 这都因雅各的罪过
'zhe'duan'bu'shi'ni'suo'xing'de 这断不是你所行的
'zhe'e'bei'dei'shi'ye'xi'de'fu 这俄备得是耶西的父
'zhe'e'hui'zhong'xiang'wo'fa'yuan'yan 这恶会众向我发怨言
'zhe'e'min'bu'ken'ting'wo'de'hua 这恶民不肯听我的话
'zhe'e'ren'bi'si'zai'zui'nie'zhi'zhong 这恶人必死在罪孽之中
'zhe'en'dian'shi'wan'gu'zhi'xian 这恩典是万古之先
'zhe'er'guo'zhe'er'bang'bi'gui'yu'wo 这二国这二邦必归于我
'zhe'er'he'e'nan'si'zai'jia'nan'di 这珥和俄南死在迦南地

'zhe'er'shi'san'nian'zhi'nei 这二十叁年之内
'zhe'fa'du'wo'shen'xi'ai 这法度我甚喜爱
'zhe'fan'de'shi'shen'me'zui'ne 这犯的是甚么罪呢

'zhe'zai'ni'men'yi'qie'de'zhu'chu 这在你们一切的住处

'zhe'zai'que'bu'de'lin'jin'ni 这灾却不得临近你
'zhe'zai'shen'kan'shi'ke'xi'ai'de 这在神看是可喜爱的

'zhi'yu'ni'men'sheng'xia'de'ren 至于你们剩下的人
'zhi'yu'ni'suo'ting'jian'de'hua 至于你所听见的话
'zhi'yu'ni'wo'jin'ri'suo'shuo'de'hua 至于你我今日所说的话
'zhi'yu'sa'mu'er'suo'shuo'de'guo'shi 至于撒母耳所说的国事
'zhi'yu'si'huo'wu'de'xing'xiang 至于四活物的形象
'zhi'yu'suo'fen'fu'li'wei'ren'de 至于所吩咐利未人的
'zhi'yu'ta'men'lian'de'mu'yang 至于他们脸的模样
'zhi'yu'ta'ru'jin'zen'me'neng'kan'jian 至于他如今怎么能看见
'zhi'yu'ta'wu'xing'de'na'cuo'shi 至于他误行的那错事
'zhi'yu'ta'yi'qie'de'di'ren 至于他一切的敌人
'zhi'yu'wai'ren'you'shen'shen'pan'ta'men 至于外人有神审判他们

'zhi'yu'xin'zhu'de'wai'bang'ren 至于信主的外邦人
'zhi'yu'yin'luan'bing'yi'qie'wu'hui 至于淫乱并一切污秽
'zhi'yu'you'da'guo'sheng'xia'de'min 至于犹大国剩下的民
'zhi'yu'zao'zai'shan'gang'shang'de'cheng 至于造在山岗上的城
'zhi'yu'zhe'min'de'yi'qie'e 至于这民的一切恶
'zhi'yu'zuo'xian'zhi'jiang'dao'de 至于作先知讲道的
'zhi'zai'hu'fa'lian'min'de'shen 只在乎发怜悯的神
'zhi'zai'na'jiao'ta'sheng'zhang'de'shen 只在那叫他生长的神
'zhi'zai'ni'men'zhong'jian'cun'xin'wen'rou 只在你们中间存心温柔

'zhi'zi'hao'xiang'jia'mei'de'xiang'bai'shu 枝子好象佳美的香柏树

'zuo'wei'gong'wu'xian'gei'ye'he'hua 作为供物献给耶和华
'zuo'wei'shi'shi'dai'dai'chang'shao'de'xiang 作为世世代代常烧的香
'zuo'wei'shi'shi'dai'dai'de'ding'li 作为世世代代的定例
'zuo'wei'tu'chan'chu'shu'de'guo'zi 作为土产初熟的果子
'zuo'wei'xian'gei'ye'he'hua'de'ju'ji 作为献给耶和华的举祭
'zuo'wei'xin'xiang'huo'ji'de'shi'wu 作为馨香火祭的食物
'zuo'wei'ya'ge'hui'zhong'de'chan'ye 作为雅各会众的产业
'zuo'wei'ye'he'hua'de'huo'ji 作为耶和华的火祭
'zuo'wei'ye'he'hua'de'ju'ji 作为耶和华的举祭
'zuo'wei'zao'cheng'gai'fang'jiao'ye'zhi'di 作为造城盖房郊野之地
'zuo'wei'zhang'mu'yi'shang'de'zhao'peng 作为帐幕以上的罩棚
'zuo'wo'wa'zhe'kou'jing'de'zheng'ju 作我挖这口井的证据
'zuo'wo'zai'ni'men'zhong'jian'de'fen'di 作我在你们中间的坟地
'zuo'yi'se'lie'de'mei'ge'zhe 作以色列的美歌者
'zuo'yi'se'lie'di'shi'shi'shi'nian 作以色列的士师十年
'zuo'yi'se'lie'ren'de'bao'zhang 作以色列人的保障
'zuo'yi'se'lie'wang'er'nian'de'shi'hou 作以色列王二年的时候
'zuo'yi'se'lie'wang'gong'er'nian 作以色列王共二年
'zuo'yi'se'lie'zhi'pai'zhi'yi 作以色列支派之一
'zuo'you'de'ren'jian'guang'jing'bu'hao 左右的人见光景不好
'zuo'you'dou'mei'you'zhuan'zhe'de'di'fang 左右都没有转折的地方
'zuo'zai'cheng'men'kou'de'tan'lun'wo 坐在城门口的谈论我
'zuo'zai'cheng'zhong'gao'chu'de'zuo'wei'shang 坐在城中高处的座位上
'zuo'zai'er'ji'lu'bo'shang'de'a 坐在二基路伯上的啊
'zuo'zai'mi'ji'lun'de'shi'liu'shu'xia 坐在米矶仑的石榴树下
'zuo'zai'wei'shang'jin'xing'qiang'bao 坐在位上尽行强暴
'zuo'zai'wo'de'xi'shang'chi'he 坐在我的席上吃喝
'zuo'zai'ye'he'hua'dian'de'xin'men'kou 坐在耶和华殿的新门口
'zuo'zai'ye'he'hua'mian'qian'ku'hao 坐在耶和华面前哭号
'zuo'zi'you'zhi'ren'meng'zhao'de 作自由之人蒙召的
